an5.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.1:3.5_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
an5.2:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an5.2:2.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5.2:5.2_2: ariyasāvako āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an5.2:6.2_2: ariyasāvako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.3:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ,
an5.3:1.1_3: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an5.3:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti.
an5.3:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ,
an5.3:1.4_3: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an5.3:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ,
an5.3:2.1_3: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
an5.3:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirīmā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
an5.3:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ,
an5.3:2.4_3: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
an5.4:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.4:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti.
an5.4:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.4:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an5.4:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirīmā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
an5.4:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an5.5:1.1_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati,
an5.5:1.1_3: tassa diṭṭheva dhamme pañca sahadhammikā vādānupātā gārayhā ṭhānā āgacchanti.
an5.5:1.3_0: Saddhāpi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:1.3_1: hirīpi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:1.3_2: ottappampi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:1.3_3: vīriyampi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:1.3_4: paññāpi nāma te nāhosi kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.5:1.4_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati,
an5.5:1.4_3: tassa diṭṭheva dhamme ime pañca sahadhammikā vādānupātā gārayhā ṭhānā āgacchanti.
an5.5:2.1_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukho rudamāno paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati,
an5.5:2.1_3: tassa diṭṭheva dhamme pañca sahadhammikā pāsaṁsā ṭhānā āgacchanti.
an5.5:2.3_0: Saddhāpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:2.3_1: hirīpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:2.3_2: ottappampi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:2.3_3: vīriyampi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.5:2.3_4: paññāpi nāma te ahosi kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.5:2.4_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassena assumukho rudamāno paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati,
an5.5:2.4_3: tassa diṭṭheva dhamme ime pañca sahadhammikā pāsaṁsā ṭhānā āgacchantī”ti.
an5.6:1.1_0: “Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva saddhā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:1.2_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, saddhā antarahitā hoti, assaddhiyaṁ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.6:2.1_0: Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva hirī paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:2.2_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, hirī antarahitā hoti, ahirikaṁ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.6:3.1_0: Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva ottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:3.2_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ottappaṁ antarahitaṁ hoti, anottappaṁ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.6:4.1_0: Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva vīriyaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:4.2_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, vīriyaṁ antarahitaṁ hoti, kosajjaṁ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.6:5.1_0: Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva paññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.6:5.2_0: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, paññā antarahitā hoti, duppaññā pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.7:1.2_2: kulaputto ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti,
an5.7:1.4_0: Labbhā, bhikkhave, yobbanena kāmā te ca kho yādisā vā tādisā vā.
an5.7:1.5_2: hīnā kāmā ye ca majjhimā kāmā ye ca paṇītā kāmā,
an5.7:1.6_2: daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako dhātiyā pamādamanvāya kaṭṭhaṁ vā kaṭhalaṁ vā mukhe āhareyya.
an5.7:1.7_0: Tamenaṁ dhāti sīghaṁ sīghaṁ manasi kareyya;
an5.7:1.8_0: sīghaṁ sīghaṁ manasi karitvā sīghaṁ sīghaṁ āhareyya.
an5.7:1.9_0: No ce sakkuṇeyya sīghaṁ sīghaṁ āharituṁ,
an5.7:1.9_1: vāmena hatthena sīsaṁ pariggahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena vaṅkaṅguliṁ karitvā salohitampi āhareyya.
an5.7:1.13_0: Karaṇīyañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, dhātiyā atthakāmāya hitesiniyā anukampikāya, anukampaṁ upādāya.
an5.7:2.1_2: yāvakīvañca bhikkhuno saddhāya akataṁ hoti kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.7:2.2_2: bhikkhuno saddhāya kataṁ hoti kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.8:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.3_0: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.4_0: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.5_0: Anottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.6_0: Kusīto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.7_0: Duppañño, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.3_0: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.4_0: Hirīmā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.5_0: Ottappī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.6_0: Āraddhavīriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.7_0: Paññavā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.8:2.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme”ti.
an5.9:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu agāravo appatisso cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.9:1.3_0: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.

an5.9:1.6_0: Kusīto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso cavati, nappatiṭṭhāti saddhamme.

an5.9:2.7_0: Paññavā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso na cavati, patiṭṭhāti saddhamme.
an5.9:2.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso na cavati,

an5.11:1.2_3: yehi balehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,

an5.12:2.2_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ sekhabalānaṁ etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ saṅgāhikaṁ etaṁ saṅghātaniyaṁ,
an5.14:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an5.14:2.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5.14:3.2_2: ariyasāvako āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an5.14:3.2_3: kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.14:4.2_2: ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato,
an5.14:5.2_2: ariyasāvako vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an5.14:5.3_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an5.14:5.4_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an5.14:5.4_1: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an5.14:5.5_0: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
an5.14:6.2_2: ariyasāvako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
