an5.16:1.7_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ balānaṁ etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ saṅgāhikaṁ etaṁ saṅghātaniyaṁ,
an5.17:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an5.17:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:1.4_0: attanā samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṁ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:1.5_0: attanā paññāsampanno hoti, no paraṁ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:1.6_0: attanā vimuttisampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:1.7_0: attanā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.17:1.8_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya paṭipanno hoti,
an5.18:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an5.18:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā na sīlasampanno hoti, paraṁ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:1.4_0: attanā na samādhisampanno hoti, paraṁ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:1.5_0: attanā na paññāsampanno hoti, paraṁ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:1.6_0: attanā na vimuttisampanno hoti, paraṁ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:1.7_0: attanā na vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, paraṁ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.18:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu parahitāya paṭipanno hoti,
an5.19:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an5.19:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā na sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:1.4_0: attanā na samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṁ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:1.5_0: attanā na paññāsampanno hoti, no paraṁ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:1.6_0: attanā na vimuttisampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.19:1.7_0: attanā na vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, no paraṁ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.19:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti,
an5.20:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
an5.20:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, parañca sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.20:1.5_0: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, parañca vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.20:1.6_0: attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, parañca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.20:1.7_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya ca paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti.
an5.21:1.1_2: bhikkhu agāravo appatisso asabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:1.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:1.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sīlāni paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:1.4_0: ‘Sīlāni aparipūretvā sammādiṭṭhiṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:1.5_0: ‘Sammādiṭṭhiṁ aparipūretvā sammāsamādhiṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:2.1_2: bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso sabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:2.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.21:2.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sīlāni paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:1.1_2: bhikkhu agāravo appatisso asabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:1.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:1.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ aparipūretvā sīlakkhandhaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:1.4_0: ‘Sīlakkhandhaṁ aparipūretvā samādhikkhandhaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:1.5_0: ‘Samādhikkhandhaṁ aparipūretvā paññākkhandhaṁ paripūressatī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:2.1_2: bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso sabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:2.2_0: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.22:2.3_0: ‘Sekhaṁ dhammaṁ paripūretvā sīlakkhandhaṁ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
an5.23:1.1_3: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ jātarūpaṁ na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyaṁ na ca pabhassaraṁ pabhaṅgu ca na ca sammā upeti kammāya.
an5.23:1.4_3: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ jātarūpaṁ na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyaṁ na ca pabhassaraṁ pabhaṅgu ca na ca sammā upeti kammāya.
an5.23:1.5_2: jātarūpaṁ imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi vimuttaṁ hoti,
an5.23:1.5_3: taṁ hoti jātarūpaṁ mudu ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca na ca pabhaṅgu sammā upeti kammāya.
an5.23:1.6_0: Yassā yassā ca piḷandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati—yadi muddikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya yadi gīveyyakāya yadi suvaṇṇamālāya—tañcassa atthaṁ anubhoti.
an5.23:2.1_3: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyaṁ na ca pabhassaraṁ pabhaṅgu ca na ca sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an5.23:2.4_2: pañca cittassa upakkilesā yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniyaṁ na
an5.23:2.4_3: ca pabhassaraṁ pabhaṅgu ca na ca sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an5.23:2.5_2: cittaṁ imehi pañcahi upakkilesehi vimuttaṁ hoti,
an5.23:2.5_3: taṁ hoti cittaṁ mudu ca kammaniyañca pabhassarañca na ca pabhaṅgu sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an5.23:2.6_0: Yassa yassa ca abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:3.1_13: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimaseyyaṁ parimajjeyyaṁ yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteyyan’ti,
an5.23:3.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:4.1_1: ‘dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇeyyaṁ—dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti,
an5.23:4.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:5.1_0: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajāneyyaṁ—
an5.23:5.2_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.3_0: vītarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ vītarāgaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.4_0: sadosaṁ vā cittaṁ sadosaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.5_0: vītadosaṁ vā cittaṁ vītadosaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.6_0: samohaṁ vā cittaṁ samohaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.7_0: vītamohaṁ vā cittaṁ vītamohaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.8_0: saṅkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ saṅkhittaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.9_0: vikkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ vikkhittaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.10_0: mahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ mahaggataṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.11_0: amahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ amahaggataṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.12_0: sauttaraṁ vā cittaṁ sauttaraṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.13_0: anuttaraṁ vā cittaṁ anuttaraṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.14_0: samāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ samāhitaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.15_0: asamāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ asamāhitaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.16_0: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.23:5.17_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajāneyyan’ti,
an5.23:5.18_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:6.1_2: seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi
an5.23:6.1_3: jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo cattārīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi
an5.23:6.1_4: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe—amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto
an5.23:6.1_7: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
an5.23:6.1_9: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyan’ti,
an5.23:6.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:7.1_1: ‘dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an5.23:7.1_2: sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajāneyyaṁ—ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena
an5.23:7.1_3: samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṁ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
an5.23:7.1_4: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā;
an5.23:7.1_5: ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
an5.23:7.1_7: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannāti,
an5.23:7.1_8: iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
an5.23:7.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.23:8.1_1: ‘āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.23:8.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
an5.24:1.2_0: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.24:1.3_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.24:1.4_0: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.24:1.7_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.24:1.8_0: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.24:1.9_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.24:1.10_0: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.24:2.1_0: Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.24:2.2_0: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.24:2.3_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.24:2.4_0: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.24:2.6_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.24:2.7_0: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.24:2.8_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.24:2.9_0: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanan”ti.
an5.25:1.1_2: aṅgehi anuggahitā sammādiṭṭhi cetovimuttiphalā ca hoti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā ca,
an5.25:2.3_2: pañcahi aṅgehi anuggahitā sammādiṭṭhi cetovimuttiphalā ca hoti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā ca,
an5.26:1.1_2: vimuttāyatanāni yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.26:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthā dhammaṁ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī.
an5.26:2.3_3: aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthapaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an5.26:2.9_2: paṭhamaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.26:3.1_2: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
an5.26:3.1_4: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti.
an5.26:3.2_2: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthapaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an5.26:3.8_2: dutiyaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.26:4.1_2: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
an5.26:4.1_4: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an5.26:4.1_5: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti.
an5.26:4.2_2: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthapaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an5.26:4.8_2: tatiyaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino …pe…
an5.26:5.1_2: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti,
an5.26:5.1_4: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an5.26:5.1_5: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti;
an5.26:5.2_0: api ca kho yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an5.26:5.3_2: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati tathā tathā
an5.26:5.3_3: so tasmiṁ dhamme atthapaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an5.26:5.9_2: catutthaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.26:6.1_2: bhikkhuno na heva kho satthā dhammaṁ deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī,
an5.26:6.1_3: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
an5.26:6.1_4: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti,
an5.26:6.1_5: nāpi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati;
an5.26:6.2_0: api ca khvassa aññataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya.
an5.26:6.3_2: bhikkhuno aññataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya
an5.26:6.3_3: tathā tathā so tasmiṁ dhamme atthapaṭisaṁvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṁvedī ca.
an5.26:6.9_2: pañcamaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.26:7.1_2: pañca vimuttāyatanāni yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.27:1.2_2: bhāvayataṁ appamāṇaṁ nipakānaṁ patissatānaṁ pañca ñāṇāni paccattaññeva uppajjanti.
an5.27:1.4_0: ‘Ayaṁ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati,
an5.27:1.5_0: ‘ayaṁ samādhi ariyo nirāmiso’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati,
an5.27:1.8_0: ‘sato kho panāhaṁ imaṁ samāpajjāmi sato vuṭṭhahāmī’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
an5.27:2.1_0: Samādhiṁ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha appamāṇaṁ nipakā patissatā.
an5.27:2.2_2: bhāvayataṁ appamāṇaṁ nipakānaṁ patissatānaṁ imāni pañca ñāṇāni paccattaññeva uppajjantī”ti.
an5.28:1.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an5.28:1.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an5.28:2.1_0: “Katamā ca, bhikkhave, ariyassa pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa bhāvanā?
an5.28:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5.28:2.3_0: So imameva kāyaṁ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:2.3_1: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:2.4_2: dakkho nhāpako vā nhāpakantevāsī vā kaṁsathāle nhānīyacuṇṇāni ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṁ paripphosakaṁ sanneyya.
an5.28:2.4_3: Sāyaṁ nhānīyapiṇḍi snehānugatā snehaparetā santarabāhirā phuṭā snehena,
an5.28:2.5_2: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:2.6_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:2.7_0: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ paṭhamā bhāvanā.
an5.28:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5.28:3.2_0: So imameva kāyaṁ samādhijena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:3.3_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa samādhijena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:3.4_3: Tassa nevassa puratthimāya disāya udakassa āyamukhaṁ,
an5.28:3.4_7: devo ca kālena kālaṁ sammā dhāraṁ nānuppaveccheyya.
an5.28:3.5_0: Atha kho tamhāva udakarahadā sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvā tameva udakarahadaṁ sītena vārinā abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripūreyya paripphareyya;
an5.28:3.5_1: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato udakarahadassa sītena vārinā apphuṭaṁ assa.
an5.28:3.6_2: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ samādhijena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:3.7_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa samādhijena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:3.8_0: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ dutiyā bhāvanā.
an5.28:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5.28:4.2_0: So imameva kāyaṁ nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:4.3_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:4.4_2: uppaliniyaṁ vā paduminiyaṁ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṁ vā appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake
an5.28:4.4_3: jātāni udake saṁvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni anto nimuggaposīni.
an5.28:4.5_0: Tāni yāva caggā yāva ca mūlā sītena vārinā abhisannāni parisannāni paripūrāni paripphuṭāni;
an5.28:4.6_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvataṁ uppalānaṁ vā padumānaṁ vā puṇḍarīkānaṁ vā sītena vārinā apphuṭaṁ assa.
an5.28:4.7_2: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati;
an5.28:4.8_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:4.9_0: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ tatiyā bhāvanā.
an5.28:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5.28:5.2_0: So imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti;
an5.28:5.3_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:5.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso odātena vatthena sasīsaṁ pārupitvā nisinno assa;
an5.28:5.5_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa odātena vatthena apphuṭaṁ assa.
an5.28:5.6_2: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti;
an5.28:5.7_0: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
an5.28:5.8_0: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ catutthā bhāvanā.
an5.28:6.1_2: bhikkhuno paccavekkhaṇānimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya.
an5.28:6.3_2: bhikkhuno paccavekkhaṇānimittaṁ suggahitaṁ hoti sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ suppaṭividdhaṁ paññāya.
an5.28:6.4_0: Ariyassa, bhikkhave, pañcaṅgikassa sammāsamādhissa ayaṁ pañcamā bhāvanā.
an5.28:7.1_2: bhikkhu ariye pañcaṅgike sammāsamādhimhi evaṁ bahulīkate yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
an5.28:7.1_3: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:8.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakamaṇiko ādhāre ṭhapito pūro udakassa samatittiko kākapeyyo.
an5.28:8.2_0: Tamenaṁ balavā puriso yato yato āvajjeyya, āgaccheyya udakan”ti?
an5.28:8.4_2: bhikkhu evaṁ bhāvite ariye pañcaṅgike sammāsamādhimhi evaṁ bahulīkate yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa
an5.28:8.4_4: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:9.1_2: same bhūmibhāge pokkharaṇī caturaṁsā ālibaddhā pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
an5.28:9.2_0: Tamenaṁ balavā puriso yato yato āliṁ muñceyya, āgaccheyya udakan”ti?
an5.28:9.4_2: bhikkhu evaṁ bhāvite ariye pañcaṅgike sammāsamādhimhi evaṁ bahulīkate yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa …pe…
an5.28:10.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, subhūmiyaṁ catumahāpathe ājaññaratho yutto assa ṭhito odhastapatodo.
an5.28:10.2_0: Tamenaṁ dakkho yoggācariyo assadammasārathi abhiruhitvā vāmena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
an5.28:10.2_1: patodaṁ gahetvā yenicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ sāreyyapi paccāsāreyyapi.
an5.28:10.3_2: bhikkhu evaṁ bhāvite ariye pañcaṅgike sammāsamādhimhi evaṁ bahulīkate yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa
an5.28:10.4_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:11.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:12.1_1: ‘dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇeyyaṁ—dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā’ti,
an5.28:12.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:13.1_0: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajāneyyaṁ—
an5.28:13.2_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.28:13.3_0: vītarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ vītarāgaṁ cittanti pajāneyyaṁ,
an5.28:13.17_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajāneyyan’ti,
an5.28:13.18_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:14.1_4: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyan’ti,
an5.28:14.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:15.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
an5.28:16.1_1: ‘āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.28:16.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
an5.29:1.3_3: asitaṁ pītaṁ khāyitaṁ sāyitaṁ sammā pariṇāmaṁ gacchati,
an5.29:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca caṅkame ānisaṁsā”ti.
an5.30:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena icchānaṅgalaṁ nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
an5.30:1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an5.30:1.5_0: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito icchānaṅgalaṁ anuppatto;
an5.30:1.6_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.30:1.7_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi,
an5.30:1.8_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
an5.30:1.9_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an5.30:1.10_0: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
an5.30:1.11_0: Atha kho icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya yena icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.30:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgito bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
an5.30:2.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ nāgitaṁ āmantesi:
an5.30:2.3_0: “ke pana kho, nāgita, uccāsaddamahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
an5.30:2.4_1: icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā bhagavantaññeva uddissa bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
an5.30:2.5_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an5.30:2.6_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5.30:2.6_2: yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.30:2.7_0: So taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyyā”ti.
an5.30:3.3_0: Yena yeneva dāni bhagavā gamissati taṁninnāva gamissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an5.30:3.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathāninnaṁ udakāni pavattanti;
an5.30:3.5_2: taṁninnāva gamissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an5.30:4.1_0: “Māhaṁ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṁ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an5.30:4.2_1: nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5.30:4.2_2: yassāhaṁ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.30:4.3_0: So taṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṁ sādiyeyya.
an5.30:4.6_0: Piyānaṁ kho, nāgita, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā—
an5.30:4.8_0: Asubhanimittānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa kho, nāgita, subhanimitte pāṭikulyatā saṇṭhāti—
an5.30:4.10_0: Chasu kho, nāgita, phassāyatanesu aniccānupassino viharato phasse pāṭikulyatā saṇṭhāti—
an5.30:4.12_0: Pañcasu kho, nāgita, upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato upādāne pāṭikulyatā saṇṭhāti—
an5.31:1.2_0: Atha kho sumanā rājakumārī pañcahi rathasatehi pañcahi rājakumārisatehi parivutā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.31:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho sumanā rājakumārī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.31:2.1_0: “Idhassu, bhante, bhagavato dve sāvakā samasaddhā samasīlā samapaññā—
an5.31:2.3_0: Te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyyuṁ.
an5.31:2.4_0: Devabhūtānaṁ pana nesaṁ, bhante, siyā viseso, siyā nānākaraṇan”ti?
an5.31:3.2_0: “yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ devabhūto samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti—
an5.31:3.3_0: dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena.
an5.31:3.4_0: Yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ devabhūto samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti”.
an5.31:4.3_0: “yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ manussabhūto samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti—
an5.31:4.5_0: Yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ manussabhūto samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti”.
an5.31:5.3_0: “yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ pabbajito samāno pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhāti—
an5.31:5.4_0: yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati appaṁ ayācito,
an5.31:5.4_1: yācitova bahulaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñjati appaṁ ayācito,
an5.31:5.4_2: yācitova bahulaṁ senāsanaṁ paribhuñjati appaṁ ayācito,
an5.31:5.4_3: yācitova bahulaṁ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjati appaṁ ayācito.
an5.31:5.5_0: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṁ viharati tyassa manāpeneva bahulaṁ kāyakammena samudācaranti appaṁ amanāpena,
an5.31:5.5_1: manāpeneva bahulaṁ vacīkammena samudācaranti appaṁ amanāpena,
an5.31:5.5_2: manāpeneva bahulaṁ manokammena samudācaranti appaṁ amanāpena,
an5.31:5.5_3: manāpaṁyeva bahulaṁ upahāraṁ upaharanti appaṁ amanāpaṁ.
an5.31:5.6_0: Yo so, sumane, dāyako so amuṁ adāyakaṁ pabbajito samāno imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti.
an5.31:6.2_0: “Ettha kho panesāhaṁ, sumane, na kiñci nānākaraṇaṁ vadāmi, yadidaṁ vimuttiyā vimuttin”ti.
an5.31:7.2_0: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhante, alameva dānāni dātuṁ alaṁ puññāni kātuṁ;
an5.31:7.3_0: yatra hi nāma devabhūtassāpi upakārāni puññāni,
an5.31:7.5_0: Alañhi, sumane, dānāni dātuṁ alaṁ puññāni kātuṁ.
an5.31:8.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
an5.32:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an5.32:1.2_0: Atha kho cundī rājakumārī pañcahi rathasatehi pañcahi ca kumārisatehi parivutā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.32:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho cundī rājakumārī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.32:2.1_0: “Amhākaṁ, bhante, bhātā cundo nāma rājakumāro, so evamāha:
an5.32:2.2_0: ‘yadeva so hoti itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato,
an5.32:2.2_8: so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁyeva upapajjati,
an5.32:2.4_1: satthari pasanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁyeva upapajjati,
an5.32:2.5_0: Kathaṁrūpe dhamme pasanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁyeva upapajjati, no duggatiṁ?
an5.32:2.6_0: Kathaṁrūpe saṅghe pasanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁyeva upapajjati, no duggatiṁ?
an5.32:2.7_0: Kathaṁrūpesu sīlesu paripūrakārī kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁyeva upapajjati, no duggatin’”ti?
an5.32:3.1_1: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā,
an5.32:3.2_0: Ye kho, cundi, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā.
an5.32:3.3_0: Agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hoti.
an5.32:4.1_0: Yāvatā, cundi, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati.
an5.32:4.2_3: agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hoti.
an5.32:5.1_0: Yāvatā, cundi, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṁ—
an5.32:5.2_0: madanimmadano pipāsavinayo ālayasamugghāto vaṭṭupacchedo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
an5.32:5.3_0: Ye kho, cundi, virāge dhamme pasannā, agge te pasannā.
an5.32:5.4_0: Agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hoti.
an5.32:6.1_0: Yāvatā, cundi, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā, tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṁ—
an5.32:6.2_1: esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.32:6.3_0: Ye kho, cundi, saṅghe pasannā, agge te pasannā.
an5.32:6.4_0: Agge kho pana pasannānaṁ aggo vipāko hoti.
an5.32:7.1_0: Yāvatā, cundi, sīlāni, ariyakantāni sīlāni tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṁ—
an5.32:7.2_0: akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni.
an5.32:7.3_0: Ye kho, cundi, ariyakantesu sīlesu paripūrakārino, agge te paripūrakārino.
an5.32:7.4_0: Agge kho pana paripūrakārīnaṁ aggo vipāko hotīti.
an5.33:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaddiye viharati jātiyā vane.
an5.33:1.2_0: Atha kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.33:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.33:2.1_0: “Adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā svātanāya attacatuttho bhattan”ti.
an5.33:2.3_0: Atha kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an5.33:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggahassa meṇḍakanattuno nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.33:3.2_0: Atha kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
an5.33:3.3_0: Atha kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.33:3.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uggaho meṇḍakanattā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.33:3.7_0: anusāsatu tāsaṁ, bhante, bhagavā, yaṁ tāsaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
an5.33:4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tā kumāriyo etadavoca:
an5.33:4.3_0: ‘yassa vo mātāpitaro bhattuno dassanti atthakāmā hitesino anukampakā anukampaṁ upādāya,
an5.33:4.3_1: tassa bhavissāma pubbuṭṭhāyiniyo pacchānipātiniyo kiṅkārapaṭissāviniyo manāpacāriniyo piyavādiniyo’ti.
an5.33:5.2_0: ‘ye te bhattu garuno bhavissanti mātāti vā pitāti vā samaṇabrāhmaṇāti vā,
an5.33:5.2_1: te sakkarissāma garuṁ karissāma mānessāma pūjessāma abbhāgate ca āsanodakena paṭipūjessāmā’ti.
an5.33:6.2_0: ‘ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā uṇṇāti vā kappāsāti vā,
an5.33:7.2_0: ‘yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā,
an5.33:7.2_1: tesaṁ katañca katato jānissāma akatañca akatato jānissāma,
an5.33:8.2_0: ‘yaṁ bhattā āharissati dhanaṁ vā dhaññaṁ vā rajataṁ vā jātarūpaṁ vā,
an5.33:8.2_2: tattha ca bhavissāma adhuttī athenī asoṇḍī avināsikāyo’ti.
an5.33:8.4_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatīti.
an5.34:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.34:1.2_0: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.34:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.34:1.3_0: “sakkā nu kho, bhante, bhagavā sandiṭṭhikaṁ dānaphalaṁ paññāpetun”ti?
an5.34:2.2_0: “dāyako, sīha, dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo.
an5.34:2.3_0: Yampi, sīha, dāyako dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṁ dānaphalaṁ.
an5.34:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, sīha, dāyakaṁ dānapatiṁ santo sappurisā bhajanti.
an5.34:3.2_0: Yampi, sīha, dāyakaṁ dānapatiṁ santo sappurisā bhajanti, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṁ dānaphalaṁ.
an5.34:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, sīha, dāyakassa dānapatino kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.34:4.2_0: Yampi, sīha, dāyakassa dānapatino kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṁ dānaphalaṁ.
an5.34:5.1_1: dāyako dānapati yaṁ yadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ
an5.34:5.2_1: dāyako dānapati yaṁ yadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ
an5.34:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, sīha, dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.34:6.2_1: dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati,
an5.34:7.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, sīho senāpati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.34:7.3_0: Ahaṁ, bhante, dāyako dānapati bahuno janassa piyo manāpo.
an5.34:7.4_0: Ahaṁ, bhante, dāyako dānapati; maṁ santo sappurisā bhajanti.
an5.34:7.6_1: dāyako dānapati yaṁ yadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamāmi—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ yadi gahapatiparisaṁ
an5.34:7.8_0: Yañca kho maṁ, bhante, bhagavā evamāha:
an5.34:7.9_1: dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjatī’ti,
an5.34:7.9_3: ettha ca panāhaṁ bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti.
an5.34:7.11_0: Dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjatīti.
an5.34:8.1_0: Dadaṁ piyo hoti bhajanti naṁ bahū,
an5.35:1.7_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.35:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dāne ānisaṁsāti.
an5.36:1.7_0: yāni tāni navasassāni navaphalāni tāni paṭhamaṁ sīlavantesu patiṭṭhāpeti.
an5.37:1.1_0: “Bhojanaṁ, bhikkhave, dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṁ pañca ṭhānāni deti.
an5.37:1.3_0: Āyuṁ deti, vaṇṇaṁ deti, sukhaṁ deti, balaṁ deti, paṭibhānaṁ deti.
an5.37:1.4_0: Āyuṁ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā;
an5.37:1.5_0: vaṇṇaṁ datvā vaṇṇassa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā;
an5.37:1.6_0: sukhaṁ datvā sukhassa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā;
an5.37:1.7_0: balaṁ datvā balassa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā;
an5.37:1.8_0: paṭibhānaṁ datvā paṭibhānassa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an5.37:1.9_0: Bhojanaṁ, bhikkhave, dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṁ imāni pañca ṭhānāni detīti.
an5.38:1.3_2: loke santo sappurisā te saddhaññeva paṭhamaṁ anukampantā anukampanti,
an5.38:1.4_0: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṁ upasaṅkamantā upasaṅkamanti, no tathā assaddhaṁ;
an5.38:1.5_0: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṁ paṭiggaṇhantā paṭiggaṇhanti, no tathā assaddhaṁ;
an5.38:1.6_0: saddhaññeva paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ desentā desenti, no tathā assaddhaṁ;
an5.38:1.7_0: saddho kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.38:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca saddhe kulaputte ānisaṁsā.
an5.38:2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, subhūmiyaṁ catumahāpathe mahānigrodho samantā pakkhīnaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ hoti;
an5.38:2.2_2: saddho kulaputto bahuno janassa paṭisaraṇaṁ hoti bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānanti.
an5.39:1.1_0: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, ṭhānāni sampassantā mātāpitaro puttaṁ icchanti kule jāyamānaṁ.
an5.39:1.7_0: atha vā pana petānaṁ kālaṅkatānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ anuppadassatīti.
an5.39:1.8_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca ṭhānāni sampassantā mātāpitaro puttaṁ icchanti kule jāyamānanti.
an5.40:1.1_0: “Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an5.40:1.8_0: Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā imāhi pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an5.40:1.9_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, saddhaṁ kulaputtaṁ nissāya antojano pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhati.
an5.40:1.16_0: Saddhaṁ, bhikkhave, kulaputtaṁ nissāya antojano imāhi pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhatīti.
an5.41:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.41:1.2_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.41:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.41:1.5_1: ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.41:1.5_2: attānaṁ sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati;
an5.41:1.6_0: mātāpitaro sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati;
an5.41:1.7_0: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati.
an5.41:2.1_1: ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.41:2.1_2: mittāmacce sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati.
an5.41:3.1_1: ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi yā tā honti āpadā—
an5.41:3.2_0: aggito vā udakato vā rājato vā corato vā appiyato vā dāyādato—
an5.41:3.3_0: tathārūpāsu āpadāsu bhogehi pariyodhāya vattati, sotthiṁ attānaṁ karoti.
an5.41:4.1_1: ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi pañcabaliṁ kattā hoti.
an5.41:5.1_1: ariyasāvako uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.41:5.1_2: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā madappamādā paṭiviratā khantisoracce niviṭṭhā ekamattānaṁ damenti ekamattānaṁ samenti
an5.41:5.1_4: tathārūpesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṁ sukhavipākaṁ saggasaṁvattanikaṁ.
an5.41:5.3_0: Ime kho, gahapati, pañca bhogānaṁ ādiyā.
an5.41:6.1_1: ariyasāvakassa ime pañca bhogānaṁ ādiye ādiyato bhogā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti,
an5.41:6.2_0: ‘ye vata bhogānaṁ ādiyā te cāhaṁ ādiyāmi bhogā ca me parikkhayaṁ gacchantī’ti.
an5.41:6.4_1: ariyasāvakassa ime pañca bhogānaṁ ādiye ādiyato bhogā abhivaḍḍhanti,
an5.41:6.5_0: ‘ye vata bhogānaṁ ādiyā te cāhaṁ ādiyāmi bhogā ca me abhivaḍḍhantī’ti.
an5.42:1.1_0: “Sappuriso, bhikkhave, kule jāyamāno bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya hoti;
an5.42:2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāmegho sabbasassāni sampādento bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya hoti;
an5.42:2.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, sappuriso kule jāyamāno bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya hoti;
an5.43:1.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.43:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.43:2.1_0: “Pañcime, gahapati, dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dullabhā lokasmiṁ.
an5.43:2.3_0: Āyu, gahapati, iṭṭho kanto manāpo dullabho lokasmiṁ;
an5.43:2.4_0: vaṇṇo iṭṭho kanto manāpo dullabho lokasmiṁ;
an5.43:2.5_0: sukhaṁ iṭṭhaṁ kantaṁ manāpaṁ dullabhaṁ lokasmiṁ;
an5.43:2.6_0: yaso iṭṭho kanto manāpo dullabho lokasmiṁ;
an5.43:2.7_0: saggā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dullabhā lokasmiṁ.
an5.43:2.8_0: Ime kho, gahapati, pañca dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā dullabhā lokasmiṁ.
an5.43:3.1_1: pañcannaṁ dhammānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ dullabhānaṁ lokasmiṁ na āyācanahetu vā patthanāhetu vā paṭilābhaṁ vadāmi.
an5.43:3.2_1: pañcannaṁ dhammānaṁ iṭṭhānaṁ kantānaṁ manāpānaṁ dullabhānaṁ lokasmiṁ āyācanahetu vā patthanāhetu vā paṭilābho abhavissa,
an5.43:4.1_0: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasāvako āyukāmo āyuṁ āyācituṁ vā abhinandituṁ vā āyussa vāpi hetu.
an5.43:4.2_0: Āyukāmena, gahapati, ariyasāvakena āyusaṁvattanikā paṭipadā paṭipajjitabbā.
an5.43:4.3_0: Āyusaṁvattanikā hissa paṭipadā paṭipannā āyupaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an5.43:4.4_0: So lābhī hoti āyussa dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an5.43:5.1_1: arahati ariyasāvako vaṇṇakāmo vaṇṇaṁ āyācituṁ vā abhinandituṁ vā vaṇṇassa vāpi hetu.
an5.43:5.2_0: Vaṇṇakāmena, gahapati, ariyasāvakena vaṇṇasaṁvattanikā paṭipadā paṭipajjitabbā.
an5.43:5.3_0: Vaṇṇasaṁvattanikā hissa paṭipadā paṭipannā vaṇṇapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an5.43:5.4_0: So lābhī hoti vaṇṇassa dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an5.43:6.1_1: arahati ariyasāvako sukhakāmo sukhaṁ āyācituṁ vā abhinandituṁ vā sukhassa vāpi hetu.
an5.43:6.2_0: Sukhakāmena, gahapati, ariyasāvakena sukhasaṁvattanikā paṭipadā paṭipajjitabbā.
an5.43:6.3_0: Sukhasaṁvattanikā hissa paṭipadā paṭipannā sukhapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an5.43:6.4_0: So lābhī hoti sukhassa dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an5.43:7.1_0: Na kho, gahapati, arahati ariyasāvako yasakāmo yasaṁ āyācituṁ vā abhinandituṁ vā yasassa vāpi hetu.
an5.43:7.2_0: Yasakāmena, gahapati, ariyasāvakena yasasaṁvattanikā paṭipadā paṭipajjitabbā.
an5.43:7.3_0: Yasasaṁvattanikā hissa paṭipadā paṭipannā yasapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an5.43:7.4_0: So lābhī hoti yasassa dibbassa vā mānusassa vā.
an5.43:8.1_1: arahati ariyasāvako saggakāmo saggaṁ āyācituṁ vā abhinandituṁ vā saggānaṁ vāpi hetu.
an5.43:8.2_0: Saggakāmena, gahapati, ariyasāvakena saggasaṁvattanikā paṭipadā paṭipajjitabbā.
an5.43:8.3_0: Saggasaṁvattanikā hissa paṭipadā paṭipannā saggapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an5.44:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.44:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggassa gahapatino vesālikassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:1.3_0: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesāliko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.44:2.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:2.4_0: taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:3.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:3.4_0: taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:4.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:4.4_0: taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:5.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:5.3_0: Manāpo me, bhante, sālīnaṁ odano vicitakāḷako anekasūpo anekabyañjano;
an5.44:5.4_0: taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:6.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:6.4_0: tāni me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:7.1_0: “Sammukhā metaṁ, bhante, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
an5.44:7.3_1: pallaṅko gonakatthato paṭalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo sauttaracchado ubhatolohitakūpadhāno.
an5.44:7.6_0: Idaṁ me, bhante, candanaphalakaṁ agghati adhikasatasahassaṁ;
an5.44:7.7_0: taṁ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.44:7.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṁ gahapatiṁ vesālikaṁ iminā anumodanīyena anumodi:
an5.44:10.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṁ gahapatiṁ vesālikaṁ iminā anumodanīyena anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an5.44:11.1_0: Atha kho uggo gahapati vesāliko aparena samayena kālamakāsi.
an5.44:11.2_0: Kālaṅkato ca uggo gahapati vesāliko aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapajji.
an5.44:11.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.44:11.4_0: Atha kho uggo devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.44:11.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho uggaṁ devaputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.44:11.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā uggaṁ devaputtaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
an5.45:1.1_2: puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā sovaggikā sukhavipākā saggasaṁvattanikā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattanti.
an5.45:2.2_2: bhikkhu cīvaraṁ paribhuñjamāno appamāṇaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati,
an5.45:2.2_3: appamāṇo tassa puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattati.
an5.45:4.1_2: bhikkhu gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñjamāno appamāṇaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati,
an5.45:4.1_3: appamāṇo tassa puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattati.
an5.45:4.2_2: pañca puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā sovaggikā sukhavipākā saggasaṁvattanikā iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattanti.
an5.45:5.1_2: pañcahi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaraṁ puññassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an5.45:5.2_0: ‘ettako puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an5.45:5.3_0: Atha kho asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an5.45:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde na sukaraṁ udakassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an5.45:6.2_0: ‘ettakāni udakāḷhakānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasahassānīti vā ettakāni udakāḷhakasatasahassānīti vā;
an5.45:6.3_0: atha kho asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati’.
an5.45:6.4_2: imehi pañcahi puññābhisandehi kusalābhisandehi samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa na sukaraṁ puññassa pamāṇaṁ gahetuṁ:
an5.45:6.5_0: ‘ettako puññābhisando kusalābhisando sukhassāhāro sovaggiko sukhavipāko saggasaṁvattaniko iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an5.45:6.6_0: Atha kho asaṅkheyyo appameyyo mahāpuññakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatīti.
an5.47:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an5.47:2.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5.47:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako bahussuto hoti …pe… diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdho.
an5.47:5.2_2: ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
an5.47:6.2_3: udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.48:1.1_2: alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.48:1.3_0: ‘Jarādhammaṁ mā jīrī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.48:1.4_3: ‘nassanadhammaṁ mā nassī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.48:2.2_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.48:2.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.48:2.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.48:2.5_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.48:2.7_0: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.48:3.2_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.48:3.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
an5.48:3.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.48:3.5_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.48:3.7_0: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.48:4.1_0: Sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.48:4.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.48:4.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.48:4.5_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.48:4.7_1: yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
an5.48:5.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
an5.48:5.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.48:5.5_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na socati na kilamati na paridevati,
an5.48:5.7_1: yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
an5.48:6.1_2: pañca alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti.
an5.49:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.49:1.2_0: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.49:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena mallikā devī kālaṅkatā hoti.
an5.49:2.2_0: Atha kho aññataro puriso yena rājā pasenadi kosalo tenupasaṅkami;
an5.49:2.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa upakaṇṇake āroceti:
an5.49:2.4_1: rājā pasenadi kosalo dukkhī dummano pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno nisīdi.
an5.49:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ pasenadiṁ kosalaṁ dukkhiṁ dummanaṁ pattakkhandhaṁ adhomukhaṁ pajjhāyantaṁ appaṭibhānaṁ
an5.49:3.2_1: alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.50:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
an5.50:1.3_0: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṁ bhuñjati na kammantaṁ payojeti—
an5.50:1.5_0: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā piyakaṁ kosārakkhaṁ āmantesi:
an5.50:1.6_2: bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjatha,
an5.50:1.6_3: yathā mayaṁ bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ cirataraṁ passeyyāmā”ti.
an5.50:1.7_1: devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujji.
an5.50:2.2_0: “imassa kho muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
an5.50:2.3_0: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṁ bhuñjati na kammantaṁ payojeti—
an5.50:2.5_0: Kaṁ nu kho muṇḍo rājā samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā payirupāseyya,
an5.50:3.2_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:3.3_0: Taṁ kho panāyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:3.4_0: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
an5.50:3.5_0: Yannūna muṇḍo rājā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ payirupāseyya,
an5.50:3.5_1: appeva nāma muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:4.1_0: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca:
an5.50:4.2_0: “ayaṁ kho, deva, āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:4.3_0: Taṁ kho panāyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:4.4_0: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
an5.50:4.5_0: Yadi pana devo āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ payirupāseyya,
an5.50:4.5_1: appeva nāma devo āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:4.6_0: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ paṭivedehi.
an5.50:4.7_0: Kathañhi nāma mādiso samaṇaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā vijite vasantaṁ pubbe appaṭisaṁvidito upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññeyyā”ti.
an5.50:4.8_1: devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā yenāyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:4.8_2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.50:4.8_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho piyako kosārakkho āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ etadavoca:
an5.50:5.1_0: “Imassa, bhante, muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
an5.50:5.2_0: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṁ bhuñjati na kammantaṁ payojeti—
an5.50:5.4_1: āyasmā nārado muṇḍassa rañño tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:6.1_0: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:6.4_0: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpehī”ti.
an5.50:6.5_1: devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca:
an5.50:6.6_0: “yuttāni kho te, deva, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni.
an5.50:7.1_0: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā bhadraṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi yena kukkuṭārāmo tena pāyāsi mahaccā
an5.50:7.2_0: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikova ārāmaṁ pāvisi.
an5.50:7.3_0: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā yena āyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:7.3_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.50:7.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho muṇḍaṁ rājānaṁ āyasmā nārado etadavoca:
an5.50:8.1_1: alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.50:8.3_0: ‘Jarādhammaṁ mā jīrī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.50:8.4_3: ‘nassanadhammaṁ mā nassī’ti alabbhanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.50:9.2_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.50:9.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.50:9.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.50:9.5_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.50:9.7_0: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.50:10.2_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.50:10.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
an5.50:10.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.50:10.5_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.50:10.7_0: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṁyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.50:11.1_0: Sutavato ca kho, mahārāja, ariyasāvakassa jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.50:11.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ jarādhammaṁ jīrati.
an5.50:11.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.50:11.5_0: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an5.50:11.7_1: yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
an5.50:12.3_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ nassanadhammaṁ nassati.
an5.50:12.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṁ kilameyyaṁ parideveyyaṁ,
an5.50:12.5_0: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na socati na kilamati na paridevati,
an5.50:12.7_1: yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṁyeva paritāpeti.
an5.50:13.1_1: pañca alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti.
an5.50:18.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, muṇḍo rājā āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ etadavoca:
an5.50:18.5_0: Imañhi me, bhante, dhammapariyāyaṁ sutvā sokasallaṁ pahīnan”ti.
an5.50:19.1_0: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā piyakaṁ kosārakkhaṁ āmantesi:
an5.50:19.2_0: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṁ jhāpetha; thūpañcassā karotha.
an5.50:19.3_0: Ajjatagge dāni mayaṁ nhāyissāma ceva vilimpissāma bhattañca bhuñjissāma kammante ca payojessāmā”ti.
an5.51:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.51:2.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhāruhā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā.
an5.51:2.3_0: Kāmacchando, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo.
an5.51:2.4_0: Byāpādo, bhikkhave, āvaraṇo nīvaraṇo cetaso ajjhāruho paññāya dubbalīkaraṇo.
an5.51:2.5_0: Thinamiddhaṁ, bhikkhave, āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ cetaso ajjhāruhaṁ paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṁ.
an5.51:2.6_0: Uddhaccakukkuccaṁ, bhikkhave, āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ cetaso ajjhāruhaṁ paññāya dubbalīkaraṇaṁ.
an5.51:2.7_0: Vicikicchā, bhikkhave, āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhāruhā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā.
an5.51:2.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā cetaso ajjhāruhā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā.
an5.51:3.1_2: bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe appahāya,
an5.51:3.1_3: abalāya paññāya dubbalāya attatthaṁ vā ñassati paratthaṁ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttari vā
an5.51:3.1_4: manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikarissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.51:3.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadī pabbateyyā dūraṅgamā sīghasotā hārahārinī.
an5.51:3.4_2: majjhe nadiyā soto vikkhitto visaṭo byādiṇṇo neva dūraṅgamo assa na sīghasoto na hārahārī.
an5.51:3.5_2: so vata bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe appahāya,
an5.51:3.5_3: abalāya paññāya dubbalāya attatthaṁ vā ñassati paratthaṁ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttari vā
an5.51:3.5_4: manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ sacchikarissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an5.51:4.1_2: bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe pahāya,
an5.51:4.1_3: balavatiyā paññāya attatthaṁ vā ñassati paratthaṁ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttari vā manussadhammā
an5.51:4.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, nadī pabbateyyā dūraṅgamā sīghasotā hārahārinī.
an5.51:4.4_2: majjhe nadiyā soto avikkhitto avisaṭo abyādiṇṇo dūraṅgamo ceva assa sīghasoto ca hārahārī ca.
an5.51:4.5_2: so vata bhikkhu ime pañca āvaraṇe nīvaraṇe cetaso ajjhāruhe paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe pahāya,
an5.51:4.5_3: balavatiyā paññāya attatthaṁ vā ñassati paratthaṁ vā ñassati ubhayatthaṁ vā ñassati uttari vā manussadhammā
an5.52:1.1_0: “Akusalarāsīti, bhikkhave, vadamāno pañca nīvaraṇe sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
an5.52:1.2_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, akusalarāsi yadidaṁ pañca nīvaraṇā.
an5.52:1.5_0: Akusalarāsīti, bhikkhave, vadamāno ime pañca nīvaraṇe sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
an5.52:1.6_0: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, akusalarāsi yadidaṁ pañca nīvaraṇā”ti.
an5.53:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an5.53:1.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5.53:1.6_0: samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya;
an5.53:1.8_0: yathābhūtaṁ attānaṁ āvikattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu;
an5.53:1.9_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya,
an5.53:1.10_0: paññavā hoti, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.54:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto.
an5.54:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byādhito hoti byādhinābhibhūto.
an5.54:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamārūḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an5.54:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho bhinno hoti.
an5.54:5.3_0: Tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattaṁ hoti.
an5.54:5.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca asamayā padhānāyāti.
an5.54:6.3_2: bhikkhu daharo hoti yuvā susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5.54:7.1_3: samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.54:8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, subhikkhaṁ hoti susassaṁ sulabhapiṇḍaṁ, sukaraṁ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
an5.54:9.1_2: manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5.54:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5.54:10.2_2: samagge na ceva aññamaññaṁ akkosā honti,
an5.54:10.3_0: Tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti.
an5.54:10.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca samayā padhānāyā”ti.
an5.55:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.55:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ ubho mātāputtā vassāvāsaṁ upagamiṁsu—
an5.55:1.10_0: Te otiṇṇacittā sikkhaṁ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṁ anāvikatvā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseviṁsu.
an5.55:2.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.55:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an5.55:2.2_0: “idha, bhante, sāvatthiyaṁ ubho mātāputtā vassāvāsaṁ upagamiṁsu—
an5.55:2.4_3: te otiṇṇacittā sikkhaṁ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṁ anāvikatvā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseviṁsū”ti.
an5.55:3.2_0: ‘na mātā putte sārajjati, putto vā pana mātarī’ti?
an5.55:3.3_2: aññaṁ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi evaṁ rajanīyaṁ evaṁ kamanīyaṁ evaṁ madanīyaṁ evaṁ bandhanīyaṁ evaṁ mucchanīyaṁ
an5.55:3.3_3: evaṁ antarāyakaraṁ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya yathayidaṁ,
an5.55:3.4_0: Itthirūpe, bhikkhave, sattā rattā giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhosannā.
an5.55:4.1_5: ekaphoṭṭhabbampi samanupassāmi evaṁ rajanīyaṁ evaṁ kamanīyaṁ evaṁ madanīyaṁ evaṁ bandhanīyaṁ evaṁ mucchanīyaṁ
an5.55:4.1_6: evaṁ antarāyakaraṁ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya yathayidaṁ,
an5.55:4.2_0: Itthiphoṭṭhabbe, bhikkhave, sattā rattā giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhosannā.
an5.55:5.1_0: Itthī, bhikkhave, gacchantīpi purisassa cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati;
an5.55:5.3_0: Yañhi taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5.56:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena sako upajjhāyo tenupasaṅkami;
an5.56:2.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṁ saddhivihārikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.56:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.56:3.1_5: pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ ananuyuttassa viharato,
an5.56:3.3_4: pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyutto viharissāmī’ti.
an5.56:4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavatā iminā ovādena ovadito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
an5.56:4.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
an5.56:4.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an5.56:4.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
an5.56:4.4_0: Aññataro pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosi.
an5.56:5.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu arahattaṁ patto yena sako upajjhāyo tenupasaṅkami;
an5.56:5.2_4: thinamiddhañca me cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
an5.56:5.3_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṁ saddhivihārikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.56:5.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.56:5.5_4: thinamiddhañca me cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
an5.56:6.1_5: pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa viharato,
an5.56:6.1_6: yaṁ na ceva madhurakajāto kāyo hoti,
an5.56:6.3_4: pubbarattāpararattaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttā viharissāmā’ti.
an5.57:1.1_2: ṭhānāni abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbāni itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:1.3_1: jaraṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:1.4_1: byādhiṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:1.5_1: maraṇaṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:1.6_0: ‘Sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:1.8_0: Yaṁ kammaṁ karissāmi—kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā—
an5.57:1.9_0: tassa dāyādo bhavissāmī’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:2.1_3: jaraṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā?
an5.57:2.2_3: yena madena mattā kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti,
an5.57:2.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.
an5.57:2.4_3: jaraṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:3.1_3: byādhiṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā?
an5.57:3.2_3: yena madena mattā kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti,
an5.57:3.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato yo ārogye ārogyamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.
an5.57:3.4_3: byādhiṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:4.1_3: maraṇaṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā?
an5.57:4.2_3: yena madena mattā kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti,
an5.57:4.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato yo jīvite jīvitamado so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.
an5.57:4.4_3: maraṇaṁ anatīto’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:5.1_2: atthavasaṁ paṭicca ‘sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā?
an5.57:5.2_2: sattānaṁ piyesu manāpesu yo chandarāgo yena rāgena rattā kāyena duccaritaṁ caranti,
an5.57:5.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato yo piyesu manāpesu chandarāgo so sabbaso vā pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.
an5.57:5.4_2: atthavasaṁ paṭicca ‘sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:6.2_0: kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā—tassa dāyādo bhavissāmī’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā?
an5.57:6.3_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattānaṁ kāyaduccaritaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ.
an5.57:6.4_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato sabbaso vā duccaritaṁ pahīyati tanu vā pana hoti.
an5.57:6.7_0: tassa dāyādo bhavissāmī’ti abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
an5.57:7.1_0: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.57:7.2_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattā jarādhammā jaraṁ anatītā’ti.
an5.57:7.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati.
an5.57:7.4_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an5.57:7.5_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti anusayā byantīhonti.
an5.57:8.1_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattā byādhidhammā byādhiṁ anatītā’ti.
an5.57:8.2_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati.
an5.57:8.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an5.57:8.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an5.57:9.1_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattā maraṇadhammā maraṇaṁ anatītā’ti.
an5.57:9.2_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati.
an5.57:9.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an5.57:9.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an5.57:10.1_0: ‘Na kho mayhevekassa sabbehi piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo,
an5.57:10.1_1: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo’ti.
an5.57:10.2_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati.
an5.57:10.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an5.57:10.4_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an5.57:11.1_0: ‘Na kho ahaññeveko kammassako kammadāyādo kammayoni kammabandhu kammapaṭisaraṇo,
an5.57:11.1_1: yaṁ kammaṁ karissāmi—kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā—tassa dāyādo bhavissāmi;
an5.57:11.2_0: atha kho yāvatā sattānaṁ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbe sattā kammassakā kammadāyādā kammayoni kammabandhu kammapaṭisaraṇā,
an5.57:11.2_1: yaṁ kammaṁ karissanti—kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā—tassa dāyādā bhavissantī’ti.
an5.57:11.3_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ abhiṇhaṁ paccavekkhato maggo sañjāyati.
an5.57:11.4_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an5.57:11.5_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni sabbaso pahīyanti,
an5.58:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.58:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an5.58:1.3_0: Vesāliyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
an5.58:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā licchavikumārakā sajjāni dhanūni ādāya kukkurasaṅghaparivutā mahāvane
an5.58:2.1_1: anucaṅkamamānā anuvicaramānā addasu bhagavantaṁ aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ;
an5.58:2.2_0: disvāna sajjāni dhanūni nikkhipitvā kukkurasaṅghaṁ ekamantaṁ uyyojetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.58:2.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtā pañjalikā bhagavantaṁ payirupāsanti.
an5.58:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena mahānāmo licchavi mahāvane jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno addasa te licchavikumārake
an5.58:3.2_0: disvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.58:3.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahānāmo licchavi udānaṁ udānesi:
an5.58:4.4_1: ucchūti vā badarāti vā pūvāti vā modakāti vā saṅkulikāti vā,
an5.58:4.6_0: Te dānime tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtā pañjalikā bhagavantaṁ payirupāsantī”ti.
an5.58:5.1_0: “Yassa kassaci, mahānāma, kulaputtassa pañca dhammā saṁvijjanti—
an5.58:5.2_5: ye vā pana kulesu paccekādhipaccaṁ kārenti,
an5.58:6.2_1: kulaputto uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi mātāpitaro sakkaroti garuṁ karoti māneti pūjeti.
an5.58:6.3_0: Tamenaṁ mātāpitaro sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti:
an5.58:6.5_0: Mātāpitānukampitassa, mahānāma, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an5.58:7.1_1: kulaputto uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.58:7.1_2: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise sakkaroti garuṁ karoti māneti pūjeti.
an5.58:7.2_0: Tamenaṁ puttadāradāsakammakaraporisā sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti:
an5.58:7.4_0: Puttadāradāsakammakaraporisānukampitassa, mahānāma, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an5.58:8.1_1: kulaputto uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.58:8.1_2: khettakammantasāmantasabyohāre sakkaroti garuṁ karoti māneti pūjeti.
an5.58:8.2_0: Tamenaṁ khettakammantasāmantasabyohārā sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti:
an5.58:9.1_1: kulaputto uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.58:9.1_2: yāvatā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā sakkaroti garuṁ karoti māneti pūjeti.
an5.58:9.2_0: Tamenaṁ balipaṭiggāhikā devatā sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti:
an5.58:9.4_0: devatānukampitassa, mahānāma, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an5.58:10.1_1: kulaputto uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehi bhogehi bāhābalaparicitehi sedāvakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi
an5.58:10.1_2: samaṇabrāhmaṇe sakkaroti garuṁ karoti māneti pūjeti.
an5.58:10.2_0: Tamenaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇā sakkatā garukatā mānitā pūjitā kalyāṇena manasā anukampanti:
an5.58:10.4_0: Samaṇabrāhmaṇānukampitassa, mahānāma, kulaputtassa vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an5.58:11.1_0: Yassa kassaci, mahānāma, kulaputtassa ime pañca dhammā saṁvijjanti—
an5.58:11.2_5: ye vā pana kulesu paccekādhipaccaṁ kārenti,
an5.59:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajitoti.
an5.60:1.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito.
an5.60:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito”ti.
an5.61:1.1_2: saññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an5.61:1.3_0: Asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā—
an5.61:1.4_2: pañca saññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā”ti.
an5.62:1.1_2: saññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an5.62:1.3_0: Aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā—
an5.62:1.4_2: pañca saññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā”ti.
an5.63:1.1_2: vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhamāno ariyasāvako ariyāya vaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati,
an5.63:1.1_3: sārādāyī ca hoti varādāyī ca kāyassa.
an5.63:1.3_0: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena vaḍḍhati, sutena vaḍḍhati, cāgena vaḍḍhati, paññāya vaḍḍhati—
an5.63:1.4_2: pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhamāno ariyasāvako ariyāya vaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati,
an5.63:1.4_3: sārādāyī ca hoti varādāyī ca kāyassā”ti.
an5.64:1.1_2: vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhamānā ariyasāvikā ariyāya vaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati,
an5.64:1.1_3: sārādāyinī ca hoti varādāyinī ca kāyassa.
an5.64:1.3_0: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena vaḍḍhati, sutena vaḍḍhati, cāgena vaḍḍhati, paññāya vaḍḍhati—
an5.64:1.4_2: pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhamānā ariyasāvikā ariyāya vaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati,
an5.64:1.4_3: sārādāyinī ca hoti varādāyinī ca kāyassāti.
an5.65:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsākaccho sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an5.65:1.3_3: sīlasampadāya kathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.65:1.4_0: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadāya kathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.65:1.5_0: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadāya kathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.65:1.6_0: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadāya kathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.65:1.7_1: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya kathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti.
an5.65:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsākaccho sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
an5.66:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsājīvo sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an5.66:1.3_3: sīlasampadāya kathāya ca kataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.66:1.4_0: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadāya kathāya ca kataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.66:1.5_0: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadāya kathāya ca kataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.66:1.6_0: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadāya kathāya ca kataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.66:1.7_1: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya kathāya ca kataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti.
an5.66:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsājīvo sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
an5.67:1.1_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti,
an5.67:1.1_4: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5.67:1.2_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā.
an5.67:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti,
an5.67:2.7_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime pañca dhamme bhāveti,
an5.67:2.7_4: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5.67:2.8_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
an5.68:1.1_2: sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno pañca dhamme bhāvesiṁ,
an5.68:1.8_2: imesaṁ ussoḷhipañcamānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa
an5.68:1.9_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇiṁ sati sati āyatane.
an5.68:2.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇiṁ sati sati āyatane.
an5.68:3.1_1: ‘āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
an5.68:3.2_0: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇiṁ sati sati āyatane”ti.
an5.69:1.1_2: dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.69:2.2_6: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an5.69:2.3_2: pañca dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.70:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattanti.
an5.70:1.3_6: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an5.70:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.70:2.1_0: Dve ca saññā dve vaḍḍhī ca,
an5.71:1.1_2: dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā cetovimuttiphalā ca honti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā ca,
an5.71:2.2_6: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an5.71:2.3_2: pañca dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā cetovimuttiphalā ca honti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā ca,
an5.71:2.4_0: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cetovimutto ca hoti paññāvimutto ca hoti—
an5.71:3.2_2: bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an5.71:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.
an5.71:4.2_2: bhikkhuno ponobhaviko jātisaṁsāro pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
an5.71:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅkiṇṇaparikho hoti.
an5.71:5.2_2: bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
an5.71:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbūḷhesiko hoti.
an5.71:6.2_2: bhikkhuno pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni honti ucchinnamūlāni tālāvatthukatāni anabhāvaṅkatāni āyatiṁ anuppādadhammāni.
an5.71:6.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggaḷo hoti.
an5.71:7.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaṁyutto hoti?
an5.71:7.2_2: bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
an5.71:7.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaṁyutto hotī”ti.
an5.72:1.1_2: dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā cetovimuttiphalā ca honti cetovimuttiphalānisaṁsā ca,

an5.73:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.73:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.73:1.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hotī”ti?
an5.73:2.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an5.73:2.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.73:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti.
an5.73:3.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu paññattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.73:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena sajjhāyaṁ karoti.
an5.73:4.2_0: So tena sajjhāyena divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, nānuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.73:4.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhāyabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.73:5.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati.
an5.73:5.2_0: So tehi dhammavitakkehi divasaṁ atināmeti, riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, nānuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.73:5.3_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.73:6.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an5.73:6.3_0: So tāya dhammapariyattiyā na divasaṁ atināmeti,
an5.73:6.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
an5.73:7.2_1: satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya,
an5.74:1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.74:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.74:1.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hotī”ti?
an5.74:2.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ;
an5.74:2.4_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.74:3.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ deseti,
