an5.74:4.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhāyabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.74:5.1_1: bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti manasānupekkhati,
an5.74:5.2_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihārī’.
an5.74:6.2_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ;
an5.74:6.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihārī hoti.
an5.74:7.2_1: satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya,
an5.75:1.3_2: ekacco yodhājīvo rajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.75:1.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo yodhājīvo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ;
an5.75:2.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.75:2.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhājīvo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5.75:3.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.75:3.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhājīvo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ;
an5.75:4.2_0: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati.
an5.75:4.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhājīvo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:5.2_0: So taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5.75:5.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo yodhājīvo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:5.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca yodhājīvā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an5.75:6.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime yodhājīvūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsu.
an5.75:6.7_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārī vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā’ti.
an5.75:6.8_0: So taṁ sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ.
an5.75:7.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5.75:8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ;
an5.75:8.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.75:8.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho suṇāti:
an5.75:8.6_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārī vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā’ti;
an5.75:8.7_0: api ca kho sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā kumāriṁ vā abhirūpaṁ dassanīyaṁ pāsādikaṁ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṁ.
an5.75:8.8_0: So taṁ disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ.
an5.75:9.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ;
an5.75:9.2_0: api ca kho dhajaggaññeva disvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ;
an5.75:9.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5.75:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5.75:10.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.75:10.5_2: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā ūhasati ullapati ujjagghati uppaṇḍeti.
an5.75:10.6_0: So mātugāmena ūhasiyamāno ullapiyamāno ujjagghiyamāno uppaṇḍiyamāno saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.75:11.1_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, yodhājīvo sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ;
an5.75:11.2_0: api ca kho ussāraṇaññeva sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ;
an5.75:11.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5.75:12.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggaṁ, sahati dhajaggaṁ, sahati ussāraṇaṁ;
an5.75:12.2_0: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati.
an5.75:12.4_2: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā abhinisīdati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5.75:12.5_0: So mātugāmena abhinisīdiyamāno abhinipajjiyamāno ajjhotthariyamāno sikkhaṁ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṁ anāvikatvā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati.
an5.75:13.1_5: api ca kho sampahāre haññati byāpajjati;
an5.75:13.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhājīvūpamo puggalo santo saṁvijjamāno bhikkhūsu.
an5.75:14.1_6: so taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5.75:14.3_2: bhikkhuṁ araññagataṁ vā rukkhamūlagataṁ vā suññāgāragataṁ vā mātugāmo upasaṅkamitvā abhinisīdati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5.75:14.4_0: So mātugāmena abhinisīdiyamāno abhinipajjiyamāno ajjhotthariyamāno viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvā yena kāmaṁ pakkamati.
an5.75:14.5_0: So vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
an5.75:15.1_0: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
an5.75:15.2_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti;
an5.75:15.4_0: thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno,
an5.75:15.5_0: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto,
an5.75:15.6_0: vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.75:15.7_0: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
an5.75:16.1_0: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
an5.75:16.4_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
an5.75:16.6_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
an5.75:17.1_6: so taṁ saṅgāmaṁ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati;

an5.76:6.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
an5.76:6.4_0: So pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati arakkhiteneva
an5.76:6.4_1: kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi.
an5.76:6.5_0: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
an5.76:6.6_0: Tassa taṁ mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an5.76:6.7_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṁ anāvikatvā methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati.

an5.76:18.4_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an5.76:18.9_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5.76:18.10_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an5.76:18.12_0: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
an5.76:18.13_0: So araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
an5.76:18.14_0: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya …pe… so ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
an5.76:18.15_0: vivicceva kāmehi …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.

an5.77:1.1_2: anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ
an5.77:1.1_3: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.77:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, āraññiko bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.77:2.4_0: Ekakaṁ kho pana maṁ araññe viharantaṁ
an5.77:2.5_0: ahi vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, vicchiko vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya, satapadī vā maṁ ḍaṁseyya,
an5.77:2.6_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5.77:2.7_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5.77:2.8_2: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ
an5.77:2.8_3: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.77:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, āraññiko bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.77:3.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5.77:3.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5.77:3.7_2: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ
an5.77:3.7_3: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.

an5.77:4.4_1: sīhena vā byagghena vā dīpinā vā acchena vā taracchena vā,
an5.77:4.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5.77:4.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5.77:4.7_2: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ

an5.77:5.4_0: māṇavehi samāgaccheyyaṁ katakammehi vā akatakammehi vā, te maṁ jīvitā voropeyyuṁ,
an5.77:5.5_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5.77:5.6_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5.77:5.7_2: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ
an5.77:5.7_3: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.77:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, āraññiko bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.77:6.3_0: Santi kho panāraññe vāḷā amanussā, te maṁ jīvitā voropeyyuṁ,
an5.77:6.4_0: tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo;
an5.77:6.5_0: handāhaṁ vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an5.77:6.6_2: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva āraññikena bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ

an5.77:7.1_3: appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an5.78:1.1_2: anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:1.4_0: ‘ahaṁ kho etarahi daharo yuvā susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5.78:1.5_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ jarā phusati.
an5.78:1.6_0: Jiṇṇena kho pana jarāya abhibhūtena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5.78:1.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.78:1.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:1.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5.78:1.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato jiṇṇakopi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:1.9_2: paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ kho etarahi appābādho appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.78:2.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ imaṁ kāyaṁ byādhi phusati.
an5.78:2.4_0: Byādhitena kho pana byādhinā abhibhūtena na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5.78:2.4_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.78:2.5_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:2.6_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5.78:2.6_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato byādhitopi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:2.7_2: dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:3.2_0: ‘etarahi kho subhikkhaṁ susassaṁ sulabhapiṇḍaṁ, sukaraṁ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
an5.78:3.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ dubbhikkhaṁ hoti dussassaṁ dullabhapiṇḍaṁ,
an5.78:3.4_0: Dubbhikkhe kho pana manussā yena subhikkhaṁ tena saṅkamanti.
an5.78:3.6_0: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5.78:3.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.78:3.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:3.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5.78:3.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato dubbhikkhepi phāsu viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:3.9_2: tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:4.2_0: ‘etarahi kho manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5.78:4.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ bhayaṁ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamārūḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an5.78:4.4_0: Bhaye kho pana sati manussā yena khemaṁ tena saṅkamanti.
an5.78:4.6_0: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5.78:4.6_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.78:4.7_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:4.8_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5.78:4.8_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato bhayepi phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:4.9_2: catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:5.2_0: ‘etarahi kho saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5.78:5.3_0: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṁ saṅgho bhijjati.
an5.78:5.4_0: Saṅghe kho pana bhinne na sukaraṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ manasi kātuṁ,
an5.78:5.4_1: na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.78:5.5_0: Purā maṁ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:5.6_0: handāhaṁ paṭikacceva vīriyaṁ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
an5.78:5.6_1: yenāhaṁ dhammena samannāgato bhinnepi saṅghe phāsuṁ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:5.7_2: pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.78:6.1_2: pañca anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṁ appattassa
an5.79:1.1_0: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5.79:2.2_2: bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:2.3_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññe upasampādessanti.
an5.79:2.4_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5.79:2.5_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:2.6_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññe upasampādessanti.
an5.79:2.7_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5.79:2.8_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:2.11_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.79:3.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:3.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññesaṁ nissayaṁ dassanti.
an5.79:3.3_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5.79:3.4_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:3.5_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā aññesaṁ nissayaṁ dassanti.
an5.79:3.6_0: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetuṁ adhisīle adhicitte adhipaññāya.
an5.79:3.7_0: Tepi bhavissanti abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:3.10_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.79:4.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:4.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā abhidhammakathaṁ vedallakathaṁ kathentā kaṇhadhammaṁ okkamamānā na bujjhissanti.
an5.79:4.5_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.79:5.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:5.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā ye te suttantā tathāgatabhāsitā gambhīrā gambhīratthā lokuttarā suññatāppaṭisaṁyuttā,
an5.79:5.2_4: na ca te dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
an5.79:5.3_0: Ye pana te suttantā kavitā kāveyyā cittakkharā cittabyañjanā bāhirakā sāvakabhāsitā,
an5.79:5.3_4: te ca dhamme uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ maññissanti.
an5.79:5.6_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.79:6.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā.
an5.79:6.2_0: Te abhāvitakāyā samānā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā therā bhikkhū bāhulikā bhavissanti sāthalikā
an5.79:6.2_2: na vīriyaṁ ārabhissanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.79:6.4_0: Sāpi bhavissati bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā,
an5.79:6.4_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhissati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.79:6.7_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.79:7.1_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5.80:1.1_0: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5.80:2.2_0: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ cīvare kalyāṇakāmā.
an5.80:2.3_0: Te cīvare kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti paṁsukūlikattaṁ,
an5.80:2.4_1: cīvarahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5.80:2.5_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.80:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ piṇḍapāte kalyāṇakāmā.
an5.80:3.2_0: Te piṇḍapāte kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti piṇḍapātikattaṁ,
an5.80:3.3_0: gāmanigamarājadhānīsu osaritvā vāsaṁ kappessanti jivhaggena rasaggāni pariyesamānā,
an5.80:3.3_1: piṇḍapātahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5.80:3.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.80:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ senāsane kalyāṇakāmā.
an5.80:4.2_0: Te senāsane kalyāṇakāmā samānā riñcissanti rukkhamūlikattaṁ,
an5.80:4.3_1: senāsanahetu ca anekavihitaṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ āpajjissanti.
an5.80:4.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.80:5.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ bhikkhunīsikkhamānāsamaṇuddesehi saṁsaṭṭhā viharissanti.
an5.80:5.2_0: Bhikkhunīsikkhamānāsamaṇuddesehi saṁsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5.80:5.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, catutthaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.80:6.1_2: bhavissanti bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṁ ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi saṁsaṭṭhā viharissanti.
an5.80:6.2_0: Ārāmikasamaṇuddesehi saṁsagge kho pana, bhikkhave, sati etaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5.80:6.4_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṁ anāgatabhayaṁ etarahi asamuppannaṁ āyatiṁ samuppajjissati.
an5.80:7.1_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca anāgatabhayāni etarahi asamuppannāni āyatiṁ samuppajjissanti.
an5.81:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.81:1.3_0: Rajanīye rajjati, dussanīye dussati, mohanīye muyhati, kuppanīye kuppati, madanīye majjati—
an5.81:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.81:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.81:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.82:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.82:1.3_0: Avītarāgo hoti, avītadoso hoti, avītamoho hoti, makkhī ca, paḷāsī ca—
an5.82:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.82:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.82:2.3_0: Vītarāgo hoti, vītadoso hoti, vītamoho hoti, amakkhī ca, apaḷāsī ca—
an5.82:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.83:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.83:1.3_0: Kuhako ca hoti, lapako ca, nemittiko ca, nippesiko ca, lābhena ca lābhaṁ nijigīsitā—
an5.83:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.83:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.83:2.3_0: Na ca kuhako hoti, na ca lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko, na ca lābhena lābhaṁ nijigīsitā—
an5.83:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.84:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti,
an5.84:1.1_3: amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.84:1.3_0: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti—
an5.84:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.84:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.84:2.3_0: Saddho hoti, hirīmā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti—
an5.84:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.85:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.85:1.3_0: Akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ, akkhamo saddānaṁ, akkhamo gandhānaṁ, akkhamo rasānaṁ, akkhamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ—
an5.85:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.85:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.85:2.3_0: Khamo hoti rūpānaṁ, khamo saddānaṁ, khamo gandhānaṁ, khamo rasānaṁ, khamo phoṭṭhabbānaṁ—
an5.85:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.86:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.86:1.4_0: yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni kiṅkaraṇīyāni tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato alaṁ kātuṁ alaṁ saṁvidhātuṁ—
an5.86:1.5_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.87:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.87:1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.87:1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5.87:1.5_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5.87:1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.87:1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.87:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.88:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an5.88:2.5_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.88:2.5_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā appaṭividdhā;
an5.88:2.6_0: micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano, so bahujanaṁ saddhammā vuṭṭhāpetvā asaddhamme patiṭṭhāpeti.
an5.88:2.7_0: Thero bhikkhu rattaññū cirapabbajito itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5.88:2.7_1: ñāto thero bhikkhu yasassī sagahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṁ bahujanaparivāro itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5.88:2.7_2: lābhī thero bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,
an5.88:2.7_3: bahussuto thero bhikkhu sutadharo sutasannicayo itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti.
an5.88:2.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanaasukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an5.88:3.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.

an5.88:4.7_2: lābhī thero bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ itipissa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti,

an5.89:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.89:1.3_0: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhati—
an5.89:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.89:2.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.89:2.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.90:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.90:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu bahukicco hoti bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;
an5.90:1.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu appamattakena kammena divasaṁ atināmeti;
an5.90:2.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:3.1_2: sekho bhikkhu saṁsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṁsaggena;
an5.90:3.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu akālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati;
an5.90:4.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā ābhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṁ—
an5.90:5.2_0: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṁsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā,
an5.90:5.2_1: evarūpiyā kathāya na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasiralābhī;
an5.90:5.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:5.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.90:6.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.90:6.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo viyatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu;
an5.90:6.4_0: na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.90:6.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na appamattakena kammena divasaṁ atināmeti;
an5.90:7.2_0: na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.90:7.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:8.1_2: sekho bhikkhu asaṁsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṁsaggena;
an5.90:8.2_0: na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.90:8.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattati.

an5.90:9.2_0: na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.90:9.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā ābhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṁ—
an5.90:10.2_0: appicchakathā santuṭṭhikathā pavivekakathā asaṁsaggakathā vīriyārambhakathā sīlakathā samādhikathā paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā,
an5.90:10.2_1: evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.90:10.3_0: na riñcati paṭisallānaṁ, anuyuñjati ajjhattaṁ cetosamathaṁ.
an5.90:10.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattati.
an5.90:10.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.94:1.3_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an5.94:1.5_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.95:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.
an5.95:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhatī”ti.
an5.96:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ āsevanto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.
an5.96:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appaṭṭho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jīvitaparikkhāresu;
an5.96:1.6_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.96:1.6_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5.96:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ āsevanto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhatī”ti.
an5.97:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ bhāvento nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.

an5.97:1.7_2: evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;

an5.98:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ bahulīkaronto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhati.
an5.98:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appaṭṭho hoti appakicco subharo susantoso jīvitaparikkhāresu;
an5.98:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ānāpānassatiṁ bahulīkaronto nacirasseva akuppaṁ paṭivijjhatī”ti.
an5.99:1.4_0: samantā catuddisaṁ anuviloketvā tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ nadati;
an5.99:1.6_0: So hatthissa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5.99:1.7_0: mahiṁsassa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5.99:1.8_0: gavassa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5.99:1.9_0: dīpissa cepi pahāraṁ deti, sakkaccaññeva pahāraṁ deti, no asakkaccaṁ;
an5.99:1.10_0: khuddakānañcepi pāṇānaṁ pahāraṁ deti antamaso sasabiḷārānampi,
an5.99:2.1_0: Sīhoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an5.99:2.2_0: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato parisāya dhammaṁ deseti, idamassa hoti sīhanādasmiṁ.
an5.100:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.100:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nāma koliyaputto āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno.
an5.100:1.4_0: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho hoti—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:1.5_0: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
an5.100:2.1_0: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
an5.100:2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
an5.100:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho kakudho devaputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
an5.100:2.4_0: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno”ti.
an5.100:2.6_0: Idaṁ vatvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an5.100:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.100:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.100:4.1_1: koliyaputto mamaṁ upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno hoti.
an5.100:4.2_0: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvapaṭilābho—seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:4.3_0: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṁ no paraṁ byābādheti.
an5.100:4.7_0: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno’ti.
an5.100:4.9_0: Idaṁ vatvā maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an5.100:5.1_0: “Kiṁ pana te, moggallāna, kakudho devaputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
an5.100:5.2_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti?
an5.100:5.3_0: “Cetasā ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
an5.100:5.4_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti.
an5.100:5.7_0: Idāni so moghapuriso attanāva attānaṁ pātukarissati.
an5.100:6.1_0: Pañcime, moggallāna, satthāro santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an5.100:6.3_2: ekacco satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:6.5_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:6.6_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5.100:6.7_0: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:6.9_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:6.10_0: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti;
an5.100:6.11_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:7.1_2: idhekacco satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:7.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:7.4_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5.100:7.5_0: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:7.7_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:7.8_0: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti;
an5.100:7.9_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:8.1_2: idhekacco satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:8.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:8.4_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5.100:8.5_0: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:8.7_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:8.8_0: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:8.9_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:9.1_2: idhekacco satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me veyyākaraṇaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:9.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ
an5.100:9.4_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5.100:9.5_0: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:9.7_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:9.8_0: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti;
an5.100:9.9_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:10.1_2: idhekacco satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ me ñāṇadassanaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:10.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṁ
an5.100:10.4_0: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṁ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṁ.
an5.100:10.5_0: Yaṁ kho panassa amanāpaṁ, kathaṁ naṁ mayaṁ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:10.7_0: yaṁ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:10.8_0: Evarūpaṁ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṁ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:10.9_0: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:10.10_0: Ime kho, moggallāna, pañca satthāro santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an5.100:11.1_2: parisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me sīlaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.2_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti, na cāhaṁ sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.3_0: Parisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:11.4_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti, na cāhaṁ sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.5_0: Parisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:11.6_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṁ sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.7_0: Parisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me veyyākaraṇaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.8_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti, na cāhaṁ sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:11.9_0: Parisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṁ me ñāṇadassanaṁ pariyodātaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:11.10_0: Na ca maṁ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṁ sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṁ paccāsīsāmī”ti.
an5.101:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
an5.101:2.1_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, assaddhassa sārajjaṁ hoti, saddhassa taṁ sārajjaṁ na hoti.
an5.101:3.1_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sārajjaṁ hoti, sīlavato taṁ sārajjaṁ na hoti.
an5.101:4.1_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, appassutassa sārajjaṁ hoti, bahussutassa taṁ sārajjaṁ na hoti.
an5.101:5.1_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, kusītassa sārajjaṁ hoti, āraddhavīriyassa taṁ sārajjaṁ na hoti.
an5.101:6.1_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, duppaññassa sārajjaṁ hoti, paññavato taṁ sārajjaṁ na hoti.
an5.101:6.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca sekhavesārajjakaraṇā dhammā”ti.
an5.102:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hoti pāpabhikkhūti api akuppadhammopi.
an5.102:3.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ussaṅkitaparisaṅkito hoti pāpabhikkhūti api akuppadhammopī”ti.
an5.103:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro nadīviduggaṁ vā nissito hoti pabbatavisamaṁ vā.
an5.103:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro tiṇagahanaṁ vā nissito hoti rukkhagahanaṁ vā rodhaṁ vā mahāvanasaṇḍaṁ vā.
an5.103:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an5.103:4.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5.103:4.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an5.103:4.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano mahābhogo.
an5.103:5.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ito bhogena paṭisantharissāmī’ti.
an5.103:5.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tato bhogena paṭisantharati.
an5.103:5.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro bhogacāgī hoti.
an5.103:6.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro ekakova gahaṇāni kattā hoti.
an5.103:6.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro ekacārī hoti.
an5.103:7.1_2: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekāgārikampi karoti paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an5.103:8.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an5.103:9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:10.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
an5.103:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:11.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu rājānaṁ vā rājamahāmattānaṁ vā nissito hoti.
an5.103:11.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5.103:11.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṁ bhaṇanti.
an5.103:11.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:12.4_0: ‘sace maṁ koci kiñci vakkhati, ito lābhena paṭisantharissāmī’ti.
an5.103:12.5_0: Sace naṁ koci kiñci āha, tato lābhena paṭisantharati.
an5.103:12.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu bhogacāgī hoti.
an5.103:13.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivāsaṁ kappeti.
an5.103:13.3_0: So tattha kulāni upasaṅkamanto lābhaṁ labhati.
an5.103:13.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu ekacārī hoti.
an5.103:14.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati,
an5.104:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5.104:2.3_0: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṁ viharati,
an5.104:2.5_0: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni
an5.104:2.5_1: vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā,
an5.104:2.6_1: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5.104:2.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.104:2.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an5.104:3.3_0: Yehi kho pana bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ viharāmi,
an5.104:3.3_1: te maṁ manāpeneva bahulaṁ kāyakammena samudācaranti,
an5.104:3.5_0: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni—pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni
an5.104:3.5_1: vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā—tāni me na bahudeva uppajjanti.
an5.104:3.6_0: catunnaṁ kho panasmi jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī,
an5.105:1.3_2: bhikkhuno mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca,
an5.105:1.3_4: mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca.
an5.105:1.4_0: Yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni,
an5.105:1.4_1: tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
an5.105:1.5_0: Yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
an5.105:1.5_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca.
an5.106:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.106:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.106:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.106:2.1_0: “Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:2.2_0: “Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:2.3_0: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:3.1_0: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:3.3_0: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:3.5_0: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:4.1_0: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:4.3_0: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:4.5_0: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:4.6_0: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:5.1_0: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:5.3_0: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:5.5_0: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:5.6_0: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.106:5.7_0: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti.
an5.106:6.1_0: “Siyā pana, bhante, aññopi pariyāyo yathā bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyyā”ti?
an5.106:6.3_0: Yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṁ adhisīle sampavattā;
an5.106:6.5_0: apaññāto ca hoti, tena ca apaññātakena no paritassati;
an5.106:6.6_0: catunnañca jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.106:6.7_0: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati;
an5.106:6.8_0: ettāvatāpi kho, ānanda, bhikkhu saṅghe viharanto phāsuṁ vihareyya.
an5.106:7.1_0: Imamhā cāhaṁ, ānanda, phāsuvihārā añño phāsuvihāro uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmī”ti.
an5.107:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.107:3.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5.108:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo …pe…
an5.108:2.3_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an5.109:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cātuddiso hoti.
an5.109:1.3_3: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5.109:1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.109:1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5.109:1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.109:1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.109:1.8_0: Imehi, kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu cātuddiso hotī”ti.
an5.110:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṁ.
an5.110:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an5.110:1.5_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5.110:1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.110:1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.110:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevitun”ti.
an5.111:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.111:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo ca.
an5.111:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.111:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato kulūpako bhikkhu kulesu piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.112:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato pacchāsamaṇo na ādātabbo.
an5.112:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pacchāsamaṇo na ādātabbo.
an5.112:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato pacchāsamaṇo ādātabbo.
an5.112:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pacchāsamaṇo ādātabbo”ti.
an5.113:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5.113:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5.113:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharituṁ.
an5.113:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo sammāsamādhiṁ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an5.114:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā magadhesu viharati andhakavinde.
an5.114:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.114:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.114:2.1_1: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, te vo, ānanda,
an5.114:2.1_2: bhikkhū pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:2.3_2: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino,
an5.114:2.3_3: samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū’ti—iti pātimokkhasaṁvare samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:3.1_2: sārakkhitamānasā satārakkhena cetasā samannāgatā’ti—iti indriyasaṁvare samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:4.1_2: bhasse pariyantakārino’ti—iti bhassapariyante samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:5.1_2: araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevathā’ti—iti kāyavūpakāse samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:6.1_1: sammādiṭṭhikā hotha sammādassanena samannāgatā’ti—iti sammādassane samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
an5.114:6.2_1: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, te vo, ānanda,
an5.114:6.2_2: bhikkhū imesu pañcasu dhammesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti.
an5.115:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5.115:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5.115:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge.
an5.115:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge”ti.
an5.116:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5.116:1.5_0: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁseti,
an5.116:1.6_0: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁseti,
an5.116:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ niraye.
an5.116:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge.
an5.116:2.5_0: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁseti,
an5.116:2.6_0: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁseti,
an5.116:2.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṁ nikkhittā evaṁ sagge”ti.

an5.121:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.121:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gilānasālā tenupasaṅkami.
an5.121:1.3_0: Addasā kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ;
an5.121:2.1_0: “Yaṁ kiñci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ pañca dhammā na vijahanti, tassetaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ:
an5.121:2.2_0: ‘nacirasseva āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissatī’ti.
an5.121:3.2_6: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an5.121:3.3_2: bhikkhuṁ dubbalaṁ gilānakaṁ ime pañca dhammā na vijahanti,
an5.122:1.1_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā pañca dhamme bhāveti pañca dhamme bahulīkaroti,
an5.122:1.1_3: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5.122:1.2_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā.
an5.122:2.2_2: bhikkhuno ajjhattaññeva sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti dhammānaṁ udayatthagāminiyā paññāya,
an5.122:2.3_2: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime pañca dhamme bhāveti ime pañca dhamme bahulīkaroti,
an5.122:2.3_3: tassa dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
an5.122:2.4_0: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
an5.123:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
an5.123:1.3_3: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa na yathābhūtaṁ ābādhaṁ āvikattā hoti abhikkamantaṁ vā abhikkamatīti paṭikkamantaṁ vā paṭikkamatīti ṭhitaṁ vā ṭhitoti,
an5.123:1.3_4: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an5.123:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilāno dūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
an5.123:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato gilāno sūpaṭṭhāko hoti.
an5.123:2.3_3: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa yathābhūtaṁ ābādhaṁ āvikattā hoti abhikkamantaṁ vā abhikkamatīti paṭikkamantaṁ vā paṭikkamatīti ṭhitaṁ vā ṭhitoti,
an5.123:2.3_4: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an5.123:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilāno sūpaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
an5.124:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5.124:1.4_0: sappāyāsappāyaṁ na jānāti, asappāyaṁ upanāmeti, sappāyaṁ apanāmeti;
an5.124:1.6_0: jegucchī hoti uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā vantaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā nīharituṁ;
an5.124:1.7_0: nappaṭibalo hoti gilānaṁ kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5.124:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5.124:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātuṁ.
an5.124:2.4_0: sappāyāsappāyaṁ jānāti, asappāyaṁ apanāmeti, sappāyaṁ upanāmeti;
an5.124:2.6_0: ajegucchī hoti uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā vantaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā nīharituṁ;
an5.124:2.7_0: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṁ kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5.124:2.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṁ gilānaṁ upaṭṭhātun”ti.
an5.125:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
an5.125:2.3_0: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, kālacārī ca hoti, brahmacārī ca.
an5.125:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
an5.126:1.3_0: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, dussīlo ca, pāpamitto ca.
an5.126:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
an5.126:2.3_0: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṁ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, sīlavā ca, kalyāṇamitto ca.
an5.126:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
an5.127:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5.127:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5.127:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsituṁ.
an5.127:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ saṅghamhā vapakāsitun”ti.
an5.129:1.3_3: tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppāditaṁ hoti,
an5.129:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca āpāyikā nerayikā parikuppā atekicchā”ti.
an5.130:1.4_2: sattā ñātibyasanahetu vā bhogabyasanahetu vā rogabyasanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
an5.130:1.5_2: sattā diṭṭhibyasanahetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
an5.130:2.4_2: sattā ñātisampadāhetu vā bhogasampadāhetu vā ārogyasampadāhetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
an5.130:2.5_2: sattā diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
an5.131:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṁ vatteti;
an5.131:1.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5.131:2.3_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5.131:2.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5.131:3.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5.131:3.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.131:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū.
an5.131:4.3_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5.131:4.4_0: taṁ hoti dhammacakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5.132:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto pitarā pavattitaṁ cakkaṁ dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:1.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5.132:2.2_2: rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto atthaññū ca hoti,
an5.132:2.3_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭho putto pitarā pavattitaṁ cakkaṁ dhammeneva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:2.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5.132:3.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto tathāgatena anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:3.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṁ.
an5.132:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sāriputto atthaññū, dhammaññū, mattaññū, kālaññū, parisaññū.
an5.132:4.3_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato sāriputto tathāgatena anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ sammadeva anuppavatteti;
an5.132:4.4_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5.133:1.1_0: “Yopi so, bhikkhave, rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā, sopi na arājakaṁ cakkaṁ vattetī”ti.
an5.133:1.2_0: Evaṁ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.133:1.3_0: “ko pana, bhante, rañño cakkavattissa dhammikassa dhammarañño rājā”ti?
an5.133:2.1_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ
an5.133:2.1_2: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati antojanasmiṁ.
an5.133:3.1_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ
an5.133:3.1_2: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati khattiyesu
an5.133:3.2_1: rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ karonto dhammaṁ
an5.133:3.2_2: apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā antojanasmiṁ
an5.133:3.2_3: dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā khattiyesu anuyantesu balakāyasmiṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu
an5.133:3.3_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
an5.133:4.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an5.133:4.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati
an5.133:4.2_0: ‘evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:4.3_0: evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:4.4_0: evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:4.5_0: evarūpo ājīvo sevitabbo, evarūpo ājīvo na sevitabbo;
an5.133:4.6_0: evarūpo gāmanigamo sevitabbo, evarūpo gāmanigamo na sevitabbo’ti.
an5.133:5.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an5.133:5.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahati
an5.133:5.2_0: ‘evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ kāyakammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:5.3_0: evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ vacīkammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:5.4_0: evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ sevitabbaṁ, evarūpaṁ manokammaṁ na sevitabbaṁ;
an5.133:5.5_0: evarūpo ājīvo sevitabbo, evarūpo ājīvo na sevitabbo;
an5.133:5.6_0: evarūpo gāmanigamo sevitabbo, evarūpo gāmanigamo na sevitabbo’ti.
an5.133:6.1_1: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho dhammiko dhammarājā dhammaññeva nissāya dhammaṁ sakkaronto dhammaṁ garuṁ
an5.133:6.1_2: karonto dhammaṁ apacāyamāno dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammādhipateyyo dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā
an5.133:6.1_6: dhammikaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṁ saṁvidahitvā upāsikāsu dhammeneva anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavatteti;
an5.133:6.2_0: taṁ hoti cakkaṁ appaṭivattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
an5.134:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati,
an5.134:2.2_2: rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca,
an5.134:2.2_4: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena;
an5.134:2.4_0: balavā kho pana hoti caturaṅginiyā senāya samannāgato assavāya ovādapaṭikarāya;
an5.134:2.5_0: pariṇāyako kho panassa hoti paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppanne atthe cintetuṁ;
an5.134:2.7_0: So iminā yasapañcamena dhammena samannāgato yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati,
an5.134:3.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati,
an5.134:3.3_3: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5.134:3.5_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.134:3.5_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā—
an5.134:3.6_0: rājāva khattiyo muddhāvasitto aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo paripuṇṇakosakoṭṭhāgāro;
an5.134:3.7_0: āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu—
an5.134:3.9_0: paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā—
an5.134:3.12_0: So iminā vimuttipañcamena dhammena samannāgato yassaṁ yassaṁ disāyaṁ viharati vimuttacittova viharati.
an5.135:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto rajjaṁ pattheti.
an5.135:1.3_2: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca,
an5.135:1.3_4: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena;
an5.135:1.4_0: abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato;
an5.135:1.7_0: yāni tāni raññaṁ khattiyānaṁ muddhāvasittānaṁ sippaṭṭhānāni hatthismiṁ vā assasmiṁ vā rathasmiṁ vā dhanusmiṁ
an5.135:1.7_1: vā tharusmiṁ vā tattha sikkhito hoti anavayo.
an5.135:2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
an5.135:2.2_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
an5.135:2.4_0: Ahaṁ khomhi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
an5.135:2.10_0: Ahaṁ khomhi yāni tāni raññaṁ khattiyānaṁ muddhāvasittānaṁ sippaṭṭhānāni hatthismiṁ vā assasmiṁ vā rathasmiṁ vā dhanusmiṁ vā tharusmiṁ vā,
an5.135:2.12_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto rajjaṁ pattheti.
an5.135:3.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pattheti.
an5.135:3.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ:
an5.135:3.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an5.135:3.5_1: samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya;
an5.135:3.6_0: asaṭho hoti amāyāvī, yathābhūtaṁ attānaṁ āvikattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu;
an5.135:3.8_0: paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.135:4.3_0: “itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā”ti.
an5.135:4.5_0: Ahaṁ khomhi appābādho appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.135:4.7_0: Ahaṁ khomhi asaṭho amāyāvī yathābhūtaṁ attānaṁ āvikattā satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu.
an5.135:4.9_0: Ahaṁ khomhi āraddhavīriyo viharāmi akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an5.135:4.11_0: Ahaṁ khomhi paññavā udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.135:4.13_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ patthetī”ti.
an5.136:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto oparajjaṁ pattheti.
an5.136:1.3_2: rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto ubhato sujāto hoti mātito ca pitito ca,
an5.136:1.3_4: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena;
an5.136:1.4_0: abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato;
an5.136:1.7_0: paṇḍito hoti viyatto medhāvī paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppanne atthe cintetuṁ.
an5.136:2.2_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
an5.136:2.2_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
an5.136:2.4_0: Ahaṁ khomhi abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
an5.136:2.10_0: Ahaṁ khomhi paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī paṭibalo atītānāgatapaccuppanne atthe cintetuṁ.
an5.136:2.12_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto oparajjaṁ pattheti.
an5.136:3.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pattheti.
an5.136:3.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an5.136:3.7_0: paññavā hoti, udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.136:4.2_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharāmi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5.136:4.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.136:4.4_2: tathārūpā me dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an5.136:4.8_0: Ahaṁ khomhi āraddhavīriyo viharāmi akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya,
an5.136:4.10_0: Ahaṁ khomhi paññavā udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
an5.136:4.12_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayaṁ patthetī”ti.
an5.137:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, appaṁ rattiyā supanti, bahuṁ jagganti.
an5.137:1.3_0: Itthī, bhikkhave, purisādhippāyā appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.4_0: Puriso, bhikkhave, itthādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.5_0: Coro, bhikkhave, ādānādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.6_0: Rājā, bhikkhave, rājakaraṇīyesu yutto appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.7_0: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visaṁyogādhippāyo appaṁ rattiyā supati, bahuṁ jaggati.
an5.137:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca appaṁ rattiyā supanti, bahuṁ jaggantī”ti.
an5.138:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo bhattādako ca hoti okāsapharaṇo ca laṇḍasāraṇo ca salākaggāhī ca rañño nāgotveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an5.138:1.4_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo bhattādako ca okāsapharaṇo ca laṇḍasāraṇo ca salākaggāhī ca,
an5.138:2.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhattādako ca hoti,
an5.138:2.1_3: okāsapharaṇo ca mañcapīṭhamaddano ca salākaggāhī ca,
an5.138:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhattādako ca hoti okāsapharaṇo ca mañcapīṭhamaddano ca salākaggāhī ca,
an5.139:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo na rājāraho hoti na rājabhoggo,
an5.139:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ?
an5.139:2.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthikāyaṁ vā disvā assakāyaṁ vā disvā rathakāyaṁ vā disvā pattikāyaṁ vā disvā saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.139:2.2_3: na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.139:2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ.
an5.139:3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti saddānaṁ?
an5.139:3.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthisaddaṁ vā sutvā assasaddaṁ vā sutvā rathasaddaṁ vā sutvā pattisaddaṁ vā
an5.139:3.2_3: sutvā bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddaṁ vā sutvā saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.139:3.2_4: na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.139:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti saddānaṁ.
an5.139:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti gandhānaṁ?
an5.139:4.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ye te rañño nāgā abhijātā saṅgāmāvacarā tesaṁ muttakarīsassa gandhaṁ ghāyitvā saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.139:4.2_3: na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.139:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti gandhānaṁ.
an5.139:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rasānaṁ?
an5.139:5.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekissā vā tiṇodakadattiyā vimānito dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā tiṇodakadattīhi vimānito saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.139:5.2_3: na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.139:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti rasānaṁ.
an5.139:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ?
an5.139:6.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekena vā saravegena viddho,
an5.139:6.2_3: dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā saravegehi viddho saṁsīdati visīdati,
an5.139:6.2_4: na santhambhati na sakkoti saṅgāmaṁ otarituṁ.
an5.139:6.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.
an5.139:7.1_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo na rājāraho hoti na rājabhoggo na rañño aṅgaṁtveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
an5.139:8.1_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu na āhuneyyo hoti na pāhuneyyo na dakkhiṇeyyo na añjalikaraṇīyo na anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.139:9.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ?
an5.139:9.2_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā rajanīye rūpe sārajjati,
an5.139:9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rūpānaṁ.
an5.139:10.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddānaṁ?
an5.139:10.2_2: bhikkhu sotena saddaṁ sutvā rajanīye sadde sārajjati,
an5.139:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti saddānaṁ.
an5.139:11.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhānaṁ?
an5.139:11.2_2: bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā rajanīye gandhe sārajjati,
an5.139:11.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti gandhānaṁ.
an5.139:12.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasānaṁ?
an5.139:12.2_2: bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā rajanīye rase sārajjati,
an5.139:12.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti rasānaṁ.
an5.139:13.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ?
an5.139:13.2_2: bhikkhu kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusitvā rajanīye phoṭṭhabbe sārajjati,
an5.139:13.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.
an5.139:14.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu na āhuneyyo hoti na pāhuneyyo na dakkhiṇeyyo na añjalikaraṇīyo na anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.139:15.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5.139:16.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti rūpānaṁ?
an5.139:16.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato hatthikāyaṁ vā disvā assakāyaṁ vā disvā rathakāyaṁ vā disvā pattikāyaṁ vā disvā na saṁsīdati na visīdati,
an5.139:16.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti rūpānaṁ.

an5.139:17.2_3: sutvā bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddaṁ vā sutvā na saṁsīdati na visīdati,
an5.139:17.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti saddānaṁ.

an5.139:18.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti gandhānaṁ.

an5.139:20.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato ekena vā saravegena viddho,
an5.139:20.2_3: dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā pañcahi vā saravegehi viddho na saṁsīdati na visīdati,
an5.139:20.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.

an5.139:23.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṁ?

an5.139:23.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rūpānaṁ.

an5.139:24.2_2: bhikkhu sotena saddaṁ sutvā rajanīye sadde na sārajjati,
an5.139:24.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti saddānaṁ.

an5.139:25.2_2: bhikkhu ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā rajanīye gandhe na sārajjati,
an5.139:25.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti gandhānaṁ.

an5.139:26.2_2: bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā rajanīye rase na sārajjati,
an5.139:26.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti rasānaṁ.
