an5.139:27.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti phoṭṭhabbānaṁ.
an5.139:28.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5.140:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5.140:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, rakkhitā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an5.140:2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti?
an5.140:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāreti—
an5.140:2.3_0: yadi vā katapubbaṁ yadi vā akatapubbaṁ—
an5.140:2.4_0: taṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.
an5.140:2.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti.
an5.140:3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti?
an5.140:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti.
an5.140:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo rakkhitā hoti?
an5.140:4.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato rakkhati purimaṁ kāyaṁ,
an5.140:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo rakkhitā hoti.
an5.140:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti?
an5.140:5.2_2: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato khamo hoti sattippahārānaṁ asippahārānaṁ usuppahārānaṁ pharasuppahārānaṁ bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddānaṁ.
an5.140:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti.
an5.140:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti?
an5.140:6.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi disaṁ peseti—
an5.140:6.3_0: yadi vā gatapubbaṁ yadi vā agatapubbaṁ—
an5.140:6.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti.
an5.140:7.1_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5.140:8.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.140:8.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, rakkhitā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an5.140:9.2_2: bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhiṅkatvā manasi katvā sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
an5.140:9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā hoti.
an5.140:10.2_3: pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;
an5.140:10.2_7: pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an5.140:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantā hoti.
an5.140:11.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5.140:11.3_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an5.140:11.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
an5.140:11.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an5.140:11.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rakkhitā hoti.
an5.140:12.2_2: bhikkhu khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ;
an5.140:12.2_3: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ
an5.140:12.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantā hoti.
an5.140:13.2_2: bhikkhu yā sā disā agatapubbā iminā dīghena addhunā,
an5.140:13.2_3: yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ,
an5.140:13.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantā hoti.
an5.140:14.1_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an5.141:1.3_0: Datvā avajānāti, saṁvāsena avajānāti, ādheyyamukho hoti, lolo hoti, mando momūho hoti.
an5.141:2.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo datvā avajānāti.
an5.141:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvasati dve vā tīṇi vā vassāni.
an5.141:3.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saṁvāsena avajānāti.
an5.141:4.2_2: ekacco puggalo parassa vaṇṇe vā avaṇṇe vā bhāsiyamāne taṁ khippaññeva adhimuccitā hoti.
an5.141:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ādheyyamukho hoti.
an5.141:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ittarasaddho hoti ittarabhattī ittarapemo ittarappasādo.
an5.141:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo lolo hoti.
an5.141:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momūho hoti?
an5.141:6.2_2: ekacco puggalo kusalākusale dhamme na jānāti,
an5.141:6.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momūho hoti.
an5.141:6.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an5.142:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hoti;
an5.142:1.4_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
an5.142:2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ārabhati, na vippaṭisārī hoti;
an5.142:2.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
an5.142:3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ārabhati, vippaṭisārī hoti;
an5.142:3.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
an5.142:4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti;
an5.142:4.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
an5.142:5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti;
an5.142:5.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
an5.142:6.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ puggalo ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hoti,
an5.142:6.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
an5.142:6.4_2: sādhu vatāyasmā ārambhaje āsave pahāya vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā cittaṁ paññañca bhāvetu;
an5.142:6.5_0: evamāyasmā amunā pañcamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatī’ti.
an5.142:7.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ puggalo ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti,
an5.142:7.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
an5.142:7.4_2: sādhu vatāyasmā ārambhaje āsave pahāya cittaṁ paññañca bhāvetu;
an5.142:7.5_0: evamāyasmā amunā pañcamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatī’ti.
an5.142:8.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ puggalo na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hoti,
an5.142:8.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
an5.142:8.4_2: sādhu vatāyasmā vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā cittaṁ paññañca bhāvetu;
an5.142:8.5_0: evamāyasmā amunā pañcamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatī’ti.
an5.142:9.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ puggalo na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hoti,
an5.142:9.2_0: tañca cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti,
an5.142:9.5_0: evamāyasmā amunā pañcamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatī’ti.
an5.142:10.1_2: ime cattāro puggalā amunā pañcamena puggalena evaṁ ovadiyamānā evaṁ anusāsiyamānā anupubbena āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇantī”ti.
an5.143:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.143:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
an5.143:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattānaṁ licchavisatānaṁ sārandade cetiye sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an5.143:1.7_0: Imesaṁ pañcannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an5.143:2.1_0: Atha kho te licchavī magge purisaṁ ṭhapesuṁ:
an5.143:2.2_0: “yadā tvaṁ, ambho purisa, passeyyāsi bhagavantaṁ, atha amhākaṁ āroceyyāsī”ti.
an5.143:2.3_0: Addasā kho so puriso bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
an5.143:2.4_0: disvāna yena te licchavī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5.143:2.5_0: “ayaṁ so, bhante, bhagavā gacchati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho;
an5.143:3.1_0: Atha kho te licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.143:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho te licchavī bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an5.143:4.1_0: “Sādhu, bhante, yena sārandadaṁ cetiyaṁ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
an5.143:4.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena sārandadaṁ cetiyaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.143:4.3_2: Nisajja kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5.143:4.4_0: “kāya nuttha, licchavī, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
an5.143:4.5_0: “Idha, bhante, amhākaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an5.143:4.9_0: Imesaṁ pañcannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin’”ti.
an5.143:5.1_0: “Kāmādhimuttānaṁ vata bho licchavīnaṁ kāmaṁyeva ārabbha antarākathā udapādi.
an5.143:5.2_0: Pañcannaṁ, licchavī, ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5.143:5.4_0: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an5.143:5.5_0: tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an5.143:5.6_0: tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an5.143:5.7_0: tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ,
an5.143:5.9_0: Imesaṁ kho, licchavī, pañcannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an5.144:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sākete viharati tikaṇḍakīvane.
an5.144:2.1_0: “Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:2.2_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:2.3_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:2.4_0: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:2.5_2: bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paṭikūlañca appaṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajāno.
an5.144:3.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya?
an5.144:3.3_0: idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:4.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya?
an5.144:4.3_0: idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:5.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya?
an5.144:5.2_0: ‘Mā me rajanīyesu dhammesu rāgo udapādi, mā me dosanīyesu dhammesu doso udapādī’ti—
an5.144:5.3_0: idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:6.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya?
an5.144:6.2_0: ‘Mā me dosanīyesu dhammesu doso udapādi, mā me rajanīyesu dhammesu rāgo udapādī’ti—
an5.144:6.3_0: idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya.
an5.144:7.1_2: bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūlañca appaṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyya?
an5.144:7.2_0: ‘Sato sampajāno mā me kvacani katthaci kiñcanaṁ rajanīyesu dhammesu rāgo udapādi,
an5.144:7.2_1: mā me kvacani katthaci kiñcanaṁ dosanīyesu dhammesu doso udapādi,
an5.144:7.2_2: mā me kvacani katthaci kiñcanaṁ mohanīyesu dhammesu moho udapādī’ti—
an5.144:7.3_2: bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca paṭikūlañca appaṭikūlañca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyya sato sampajāno”ti.
an5.145:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.145:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.145:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an5.145:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an5.146:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.
an5.146:1.3_4: nappaṭibalo hoti kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5.146:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu mitto na sevitabbo.
an5.146:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo.
an5.146:2.3_4: paṭibalo hoti kālena kālaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ.
an5.146:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo”ti.
an5.147:1.3_0: Asakkaccaṁ deti, acittīkatvā deti, asahatthā deti, apaviddhaṁ deti, anāgamanadiṭṭhiko deti.
an5.147:2.3_0: Sakkaccaṁ deti, cittīkatvā deti, sahatthā deti, anapaviddhaṁ deti, āgamanadiṭṭhiko deti.
an5.148:2.1_2: dānaṁ datvā yattha yattha tassa dānassa vipāko nibbattati,
an5.148:2.1_4: abhirūpo ca hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato.
an5.148:3.1_2: dānaṁ datvā yattha yattha tassa dānassa vipāko nibbattati,
an5.148:3.2_0: Yepissa te honti puttāti vā dārāti vā dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā,
an5.148:3.2_1: tepi sussūsanti sotaṁ odahanti aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti.
an5.148:4.1_2: dānaṁ datvā yattha yattha tassa dānassa vipāko nibbattati,
an5.148:5.1_2: dānaṁ datvā yattha yattha tassa dānassa vipāko nibbattati,
an5.148:5.2_0: uḷāresu ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu bhogāya cittaṁ namati.
an5.148:6.1_2: dānaṁ datvā yattha yattha tassa dānassa vipāko nibbattati,
an5.148:6.2_0: na cassa kutoci bhogānaṁ upaghāto āgacchati aggito vā udakato vā rājato vā corato vā appiyato vā dāyādato.
an5.149:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.149:1.3_0: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhati.
an5.149:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.149:2.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.149:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.150:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.150:1.3_0: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, indriyesu aguttadvāratā, bhojane amattaññutā.
an5.150:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.150:2.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.150:2.3_0: Na kammārāmatā, na bhassārāmatā, na niddārāmatā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā.
an5.150:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.151:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.151:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
an5.152:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.152:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.152:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.152:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
an5.153:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.153:1.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇantopi saddhammaṁ abhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.153:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ.
an5.153:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
an5.154:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.154:1.3_5: na sakkaccaṁ dhātānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhanti,
an5.154:1.3_6: na sakkaccaṁ atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjanti.
an5.154:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.154:2.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.154:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.155:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.155:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū dhammaṁ na pariyāpuṇanti—
an5.155:1.4_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an5.155:1.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.

an5.155:2.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.

an5.155:3.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.

an5.155:4.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.155:5.1_2: bhikkhū yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ na cetasā anuvitakkenti anuvicārenti manasānupekkhanti.

an5.156:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.156:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū duggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an5.156:1.4_0: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
an5.156:1.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:2.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:3.1_2: ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
an5.156:3.1_3: te na sakkaccaṁ suttantaṁ paraṁ vācenti;
an5.156:3.2_0: tesaṁ accayena chinnamūlako suttanto hoti appaṭisaraṇo.
an5.156:3.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:4.1_2: therā bhikkhū bāhulikā honti sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā,
an5.156:4.1_3: na vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.156:4.3_0: Sāpi hoti bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā,
an5.156:4.3_1: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.156:4.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho bhinno hoti.
an5.156:5.3_0: Tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattaṁ hoti.
an5.156:5.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:5.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.156:6.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an5.156:6.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū suggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti sunikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an5.156:6.4_0: Sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
an5.156:6.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:7.1_2: bhikkhū suvacā honti sovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā,
an5.156:7.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:8.1_2: ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
an5.156:8.2_0: tesaṁ accayena na chinnamūlako suttanto hoti sappaṭisaraṇo.
an5.156:8.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:9.1_2: therā bhikkhū na bāhulikā honti na sāthalikā,
an5.156:9.1_4: vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.156:9.3_0: Sāpi hoti na bāhulikā na sāthalikā,
an5.156:9.3_2: vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.156:9.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsuṁ viharati.
an5.156:10.2_2: samagge na ceva aññamaññaṁ akkosā honti,
an5.156:10.3_0: Tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti.
an5.156:10.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an5.156:10.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an5.157:1.1_0: “Pañcannaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṁ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṁ upanidhāya.
an5.157:2.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā?
an5.157:2.2_2: saddhākathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:2.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, saddhāsampadaṁ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:3.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:3.2_2: sīlakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:3.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sīlasampadaṁ attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:4.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, appassutassa bāhusaccakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:4.2_2: bāhusaccakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:4.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadaṁ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:5.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, maccharissa cāgakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:5.2_2: cāgakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:5.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, cāgasampadaṁ attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:6.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, duppaññassa paññākathā dukkathā?
an5.157:6.2_2: paññākathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:6.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, paññāsampadaṁ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:6.6_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ puggalānaṁ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṁ upanidhāya.
an5.157:7.1_0: Pañcannaṁ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṁ kathā sukathā puggale puggalaṁ upanidhāya.
an5.157:8.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, saddhassa saddhākathā sukathā?
an5.157:8.2_2: saddhākathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:8.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, saddhāsampadaṁ attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:9.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlakathā sukathā?
an5.157:9.2_2: sīlakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:9.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sīlasampadaṁ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:10.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, bahussutassa bāhusaccakathā sukathā?
an5.157:10.2_2: bāhusaccakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:10.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadaṁ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:11.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, cāgavato cāgakathā sukathā?
an5.157:11.2_2: cāgakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:11.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, cāgasampadaṁ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:12.1_0: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, paññavato paññākathā sukathā?
an5.157:12.2_2: paññākathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:12.4_0: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, paññāsampadaṁ attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidānaṁ pītipāmojjaṁ.
an5.157:12.6_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ puggalānaṁ kathā sukathā puggale puggalaṁ upanidhāyā”ti.
an5.158:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sārajjaṁ okkanto hoti.
an5.158:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, appassuto hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti.
an5.158:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu sārajjaṁ okkanto hoti.
an5.158:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu visārado hoti.
an5.158:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
an5.158:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu visārado hotī”ti.
an5.159:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.159:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento nisinno hoti.
an5.159:1.4_0: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṁ dhammaṁ desentaṁ nisinnaṁ.
an5.159:1.5_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.159:1.6_0: “āyasmā, bhante, udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desetī”ti.
an5.159:2.1_0: “Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṁ paresaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ.
an5.159:2.2_0: Paresaṁ, ānanda, dhammaṁ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṁ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.6_0: ‘anuddayataṁ paṭicca kathaṁ kathessāmī’ti paresaṁ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.7_0: ‘na āmisantaro kathaṁ kathessāmī’ti paresaṁ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.8_0: ‘attānañca parañca anupahacca kathaṁ kathessāmī’ti paresaṁ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.9_0: Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṁ paresaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ.
an5.159:2.10_1: dhammaṁ desentena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṁ dhammo desetabbo”ti.
an5.160:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca uppannā duppaṭivinodayā”ti.
an5.161:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
an5.161:1.3_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, mettā tasmiṁ puggale bhāvetabbā;
an5.161:1.5_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, karuṇā tasmiṁ puggale bhāvetabbā;
an5.161:1.7_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, upekkhā tasmiṁ puggale bhāvetabbā;
an5.161:1.9_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, asatiamanasikāro tasmiṁ puggale āpajjitabbo;
an5.161:1.11_0: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, kammassakatā tasmiṁ puggale adhiṭṭhātabbā:
an5.161:1.13_0: yaṁ kammaṁ karissati kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā tassa dāyādo bhavissatī’ti;
an5.161:1.15_3: yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo”ti.
an5.162:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.162:1.3_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an5.162:2.1_0: “Pañcime, āvuso, āghātapaṭivinayā yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
an5.162:2.3_0: Idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti parisuddhavacīsamācāro;
an5.162:2.5_0: Idha panāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhavacīsamācāro hoti parisuddhakāyasamācāro;
an5.162:2.7_2: labhati ca kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ;
an5.162:2.9_2: na ca labhati kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ;
an5.162:2.11_2: labhati ca kālena vā kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ;
an5.162:3.2_1: bhikkhu paṁsukūliko rathiyāya nantakaṁ disvā vāmena pādena niggaṇhitvā dakkhiṇena pādena pattharitvā,
an5.162:3.2_2: yo tattha sāro taṁ paripātetvā ādāya pakkameyya;
an5.162:3.3_2: yāssa aparisuddhakāyasamācāratā na sāssa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā,
an5.162:3.3_3: yā ca khvassa parisuddhavacīsamācāratā sāssa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā.
an5.162:4.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5.162:4.4_0: So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā ubhohi hatthehi iticiti ca sevālapaṇakaṁ apaviyūhitvā añjalinā pivitvā pakkameyya.
an5.162:4.5_2: yāssa aparisuddhavacīsamācāratā na sāssa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā,
an5.162:4.5_3: yā ca khvassa parisuddhakāyasamācāratā sāssa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā.
an5.162:5.1_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro aparisuddhavacīsamācāro labhati ca kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:5.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5.162:5.6_0: Sacāhaṁ añjalinā vā pivissāmi bhājanena vā khobhessāmipi taṁ loḷessāmipi taṁ apeyyampi taṁ karissāmi.
an5.162:5.7_0: Yannūnāhaṁ catukkuṇḍiko nipatitvā gopītakaṁ pivitvā pakkameyyan’ti.
an5.162:5.8_0: So catukkuṇḍiko nipatitvā gopītakaṁ pivitvā pakkameyya.
an5.162:5.9_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro aparisuddhavacīsamācāro labhati ca kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:5.9_2: yāssa aparisuddhakāyasamācāratā na sāssa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā;
an5.162:5.10_0: yāpissa aparisuddhavacīsamācāratā na sāpissa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā.
an5.162:5.11_0: Yañca kho so labhati kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:6.1_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro aparisuddhavacīsamācāro na ca labhati kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:6.2_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno addhānamaggappaṭipanno.
an5.162:6.3_0: Tassa puratopissa dūre gāmo pacchatopissa dūre gāmo.
an5.162:6.6_0: So tasmiṁ purise kāruññaṁyeva upaṭṭhāpeyya, anuddayaṁyeva upaṭṭhāpeyya, anukampaṁyeva upaṭṭhāpeyya:
an5.162:6.10_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro aparisuddhavacīsamācāro na ca labhati kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:6.10_3: puggale kāruññaṁyeva upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ anuddayāyeva upaṭṭhāpetabbā anukampāyeva upaṭṭhāpetabbā:
an5.162:6.11_0: ‘aho vata ayamāyasmā kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveyya,
an5.162:6.13_0: Māyaṁ āyasmā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjī’ti.
an5.162:7.1_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo parisuddhakāyasamācāro parisuddhavacīsamācāro labhati ca kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:7.2_1: pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā nānārukkhehi sañchannā.
an5.162:7.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5.162:7.4_0: So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā nhātvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā tattheva rukkhacchāyāya nisīdeyya vā nipajjeyya vā.
an5.162:8.1_1: yvāyaṁ puggalo parisuddhakāyasamācāro parisuddhavacīsamācāro labhati ca kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ,
an5.162:8.1_2: yāpissa parisuddhakāyasamācāratā sāpissa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā;
an5.162:8.2_0: yāpissa parisuddhavacīsamācāratā sāpissa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbā;
an5.162:8.3_0: yampi labhati kālena kālaṁ cetaso vivaraṁ cetaso pasādaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye manasi kātabbaṁ.
an5.162:8.5_0: Samantapāsādikaṁ, āvuso, puggalaṁ āgamma cittaṁ pasīdati.
an5.162:9.1_0: Ime kho, āvuso, pañca āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo”ti.
an5.163:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.163:1.3_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an5.163:2.1_0: “Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ sākaccho sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an5.163:2.3_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, sīlasampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:2.4_0: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:2.5_0: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:2.6_0: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.163:2.7_1: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti.
an5.163:2.8_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ sākaccho sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
an5.164:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an5.164:1.2_0: pañcahi, āvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsājīvo sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
an5.164:1.4_0: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti, sīlasampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.164:1.5_0: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti, samādhisampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.164:1.6_0: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, paññāsampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.164:1.7_0: attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti;
an5.164:1.8_1: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadākathāya ca āgataṁ pañhaṁ byākattā hoti.
an5.164:1.9_0: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁsājīvo sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
an5.165:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an5.165:1.3_4: atha vā panevaṁcitto paraṁ pañhaṁ pucchati:
an5.165:1.4_0: ‘sace me pañhaṁ puṭṭho sammadeva byākarissati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ,
an5.165:1.4_1: no ce me pañhaṁ puṭṭho sammadeva byākarissati ahamassa sammadeva byākarissāmī’ti.
an5.165:1.5_0: Yo hi koci, āvuso, paraṁ pañhaṁ pucchati, sabbo so imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi, etesaṁ vā aññatarena.
an5.165:1.6_0: Ahaṁ kho panāvuso, evaṁcitto paraṁ pañhaṁ pucchāmi:
an5.165:1.7_0: ‘sace me pañhaṁ puṭṭho sammadeva byākarissati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ,
an5.165:1.7_1: no ce me pañhaṁ puṭṭho sammadeva byākarissati,
an5.166:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an5.166:1.2_1: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:1.4_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṁ ārādheyya,
an5.166:1.4_1: atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an5.166:2.2_2: anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ
an5.166:3.1_0: Dutiyampi kho …pe… tatiyampi kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.166:3.2_1: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:3.4_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṁ ārādheyya,
an5.166:3.4_1: atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:4.1_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an5.166:4.2_2: anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ
an5.166:5.2_0: “yāvatatiyakampi kho me āyasmā udāyī paṭikkosati, na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati.
an5.166:5.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.166:5.5_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.166:5.6_1: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:5.8_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṁ ārādheyya,
an5.166:5.8_1: atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an5.166:6.2_2: anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ
an5.166:7.1_0: Dutiyampi kho …pe… tatiyampi kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.166:7.2_1: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:7.4_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṁ ārādheyya,
an5.166:7.4_1: atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:8.1_0: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an5.166:8.2_2: anavakāso yaṁ so bhikkhu atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ
an5.166:9.2_0: “bhagavatopi kho me sammukhā āyasmā udāyī yāvatatiyakaṁ paṭikkosati,
an5.166:9.2_1: na ca me koci bhikkhu anumodati.
an5.166:9.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto tuṇhī ahosi.
an5.166:10.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ āmantesi:
an5.166:10.2_0: “kaṁ pana tvaṁ, udāyi, manomayaṁ kāyaṁ paccesī”ti?
an5.166:10.4_0: “Kiṁ nu kho tuyhaṁ, udāyi, bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena.
an5.166:11.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
an5.166:11.2_0: “atthi nāma, ānanda, theraṁ bhikkhuṁ vihesiyamānaṁ ajjhupekkhissatha.
an5.166:11.3_0: Na hi nāma, ānanda, kāruññampi bhavissati theramhi bhikkhumhi vihesiyamānamhī”ti.
an5.166:12.2_2: bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:12.4_0: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme aññaṁ ārādheyya,
an5.166:12.4_1: atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ aññataraṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi—
an5.166:12.7_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
an5.166:13.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā upavāṇo tenupasaṅkami;
an5.166:13.4_2: yaṁ bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etadeva ārabbha udāhareyya yathā āyasmantaṁyevettha upavāṇaṁ paṭibhāseyya.
an5.166:13.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.166:13.6_2: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ upavāṇaṁ etadavoca:
an5.166:14.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti?
an5.166:14.2_1: dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.166:14.4_0: Idha, bhante, thero bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an5.166:14.6_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5.166:14.7_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.166:14.9_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.166:15.2_1: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.166:15.3_1: pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhuno na saṁvijjeyyuṁ,
an5.166:15.3_2: taṁ sabrahmacārī na sakkareyyuṁ na garuṁ kareyyuṁ na māneyyuṁ na pūjeyyuṁ khaṇḍiccena pāliccena valittacatāya.
an5.166:15.4_1: ime pañca dhammā therassa bhikkhuno saṁvijjanti,
an5.166:15.4_2: tasmā taṁ sabrahmacārī sakkaronti garuṁ karonti mānenti pūjentī”ti.
an5.167:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.167:1.2_0: “codakena, āvuso, bhikkhunā paraṁ codetukāmena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā paro codetabbo.
an5.167:2.7_1: bhikkhunā paraṁ codetukāmena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā paro codetabbo.
an5.167:3.1_1: ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi akālena codiyamānaṁ no kālena kupitaṁ,
an5.167:4.1_0: Adhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo:
an5.167:4.2_0: ‘akālenāyasmā cudito no kālena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:4.3_0: abhūtenāyasmā cudito no bhūtena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:4.4_0: pharusenāyasmā cudito no saṇhena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:4.5_0: anatthasaṁhitenāyasmā cudito no atthasaṁhitena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:4.6_0: dosantarenāyasmā cudito no mettacittena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāyā’ti.
an5.167:4.7_0: Adhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno imehi pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo.
an5.167:5.1_0: Adhammacodakassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno pañcahākārehi vippaṭisāro upadahātabbo:
an5.167:5.2_0: ‘akālena te, āvuso, codito no kālena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:5.3_0: abhūtena te, āvuso, codito no bhūtena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:5.4_0: pharusena te, āvuso, codito no saṇhena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:5.5_0: anatthasaṁhitena te, āvuso, codito no atthasaṁhitena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:5.6_0: dosantarena te, āvuso, codito no mettacittena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāyā’ti.
an5.167:5.7_0: Adhammacodakassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno imehi pañcahākārehi vippaṭisāro upadahātabbo.
an5.167:5.9_0: Yathā na aññopi bhikkhu abhūtena codetabbaṁ maññeyyāti.
an5.167:6.1_1: ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ passāmi kālena codiyamānaṁ no akālena kupitaṁ,
an5.167:7.1_0: Dhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno pañcahākārehi vippaṭisāro upadahātabbo:
an5.167:7.2_0: ‘kālenāyasmā cudito no akālena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:7.3_0: bhūtenāyasmā cudito no abhūtena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:7.4_0: saṇhenāyasmā cudito no pharusena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:7.5_0: atthasaṁhitenāyasmā cudito no anatthasaṁhitena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:7.6_0: mettacittenāyasmā cudito no dosantarena, alaṁ te vippaṭisārāyā’ti.
an5.167:7.7_0: Dhammacuditassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno imehi pañcahākārehi vippaṭisāro upadahātabbo.
an5.167:8.1_0: Dhammacodakassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo:
an5.167:8.2_0: ‘kālena te, āvuso, codito no akālena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:8.3_0: bhūtena te, āvuso, codito no abhūtena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:8.4_0: saṇhena te, āvuso, codito no pharusena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:8.5_0: atthasaṁhitena te, āvuso, codito no anatthasaṁhitena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāya;
an5.167:8.6_0: mettacittena te, āvuso, codito no dosantarena, alaṁ te avippaṭisārāyā’ti.
an5.167:8.7_0: Dhammacodakassa, āvuso, bhikkhuno imehi pañcahākārehi avippaṭisāro upadahātabbo.
an5.167:8.9_0: Yathā aññopi bhikkhu bhūtena coditabbaṁ maññeyyāti.
an5.167:9.1_0: Cuditena, āvuso, puggalena dvīsu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṁ—
an5.167:9.3_1: pare codeyyuṁ kālena vā akālena vā bhūtena vā abhūtena vā saṇhena vā pharusena vā atthasaṁhitena vā anatthasaṁhitena vā mettacittā vā dosantarā vā,
an5.167:10.1_0: “Evampi kho te, sāriputta, vuccamānā atha ca panidhekacce moghapurisā na padakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhantī”ti.
an5.167:11.1_1: puggalā assaddhā jīvikatthā na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā saṭhā māyāvino ketabino uddhatā unnaḷā
an5.167:11.1_2: capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā indriyesu aguttadvārā bhojane amattaññuno jāgariyaṁ ananuyuttā sāmaññe anapekkhavanto
an5.167:11.1_3: sikkhāya na tibbagāravā bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā kusītā hīnavīriyā
an5.167:11.1_4: muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā duppaññā eḷamūgā,
an5.167:11.1_5: te mayā evaṁ vuccamānā na padakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhanti.
an5.167:12.1_1: kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā asaṭhā amāyāvino aketabino anuddhatā anunnaḷā acapalā
an5.167:12.1_2: amukharā avikiṇṇavācā indriyesu guttadvārā bhojane mattaññuno jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā sāmaññe apekkhavanto
an5.167:12.1_3: sikkhāya tibbagāravā na bāhulikā na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā āraddhavīriyā
an5.167:12.1_4: pahitattā upaṭṭhitassatino sampajānā samāhitā ekaggacittā paññavanto aneḷamūgā,
an5.167:12.1_5: te mayā evaṁ vuccamānā padakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhantī”ti.

an5.167:13.1_4: sikkhāya na tibbagāravā bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā kusītā hīnavīriyā
an5.167:13.1_5: muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā duppaññā eḷamūgā,
an5.167:14.1_2: kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā asaṭhā amāyāvino aketabino anuddhatā anunnaḷā acapalā
an5.167:14.1_3: amukharā avikiṇṇavācā indriyesu guttadvārā bhojane mattaññuno jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā sāmaññe apekkhavanto
an5.167:14.1_4: sikkhāya tibbagāravā na bāhulikā na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā āraddhavīriyā
an5.167:14.1_5: pahitattā upaṭṭhitassatino sampajānā samāhitā ekaggacittā paññavanto aneḷamūgā, te tvaṁ,
an5.168:1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an5.168:1.3_0: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.168:1.4_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.168:1.5_0: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.168:1.7_0: Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi pheggupi sāropi na pāripūriṁ gacchati.
an5.168:1.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.168:1.9_0: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.168:1.10_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.168:1.11_0: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.168:2.1_0: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.168:2.2_0: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.168:2.3_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.168:2.4_0: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an5.168:2.6_0: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an5.168:2.7_0: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ;
an5.168:2.8_0: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an5.168:2.9_0: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanan”ti.
an5.169:1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an5.169:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.169:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an5.169:2.4_0: “Tenahāvuso sāriputta, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an5.169:2.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
an5.169:3.2_2: bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu,
an5.169:3.5_0: Imehi ca mayaṁ pañcahi dhammehi samannāgataṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dhārema:
an5.169:3.6_0: ‘āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbāparakusalo’”ti.
an5.170:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.170:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddaji yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an5.170:1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.170:1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ bhaddajiṁ āyasmā ānando etadavoca:
an5.170:2.2_0: Atthāvuso, ābhassarā nāma devā sukhena abhisannā parisannā.
an5.170:2.5_0: Yo taṁ saddaṁ suṇāti, idaṁ savanānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:2.7_0: Te santaṁyeva tusitā sukhaṁ paṭivedenti, idaṁ sukhānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:2.8_0: Atthāvuso, ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṁ saññānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:2.9_0: Atthāvuso, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṁ bhavānaṁ aggan”ti.
an5.170:2.10_0: “Sameti kho idaṁ āyasmato bhaddajissa, yadidaṁ bahunā janenā”ti?
an5.170:3.3_0: “Tenahāvuso bhaddaji, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an5.170:3.4_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddaji āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
an5.170:4.1_0: “Yathā passato kho, āvuso, anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, idaṁ dassanānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:4.2_0: Yathā suṇato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, idaṁ savanānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:4.3_0: Yathā sukhitassa anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, idaṁ sukhānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:4.4_0: Yathā saññissa anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, idaṁ saññānaṁ aggaṁ.
an5.170:4.5_0: Yathā bhūtassa anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, idaṁ bhavānaṁ aggan”ti.
an5.171:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
an5.171:2.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako sārajjaṁ okkanto hoti.
an5.171:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako sārajjaṁ okkanto hoti.
an5.171:3.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado hoti.
an5.171:3.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado hotī”ti.
an5.172:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako avisārado agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5.172:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako avisārado agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5.172:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
an5.172:2.3_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
an5.172:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado agāraṁ ajjhāvasatī”ti.
an5.173:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.173:1.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an5.173:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an5.173:2.3_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
an5.173:2.4_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
an5.174:1.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.174:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.174:2.1_0: “Pañca, gahapati, bhayāni verāni appahāya ‘dussīlo’ iti vuccati, nirayañca upapajjati.
an5.174:2.4_0: imāni kho, gahapati, pañca bhayāni verāni appahāya ‘dussīlo’ iti vuccati, nirayañca upapajjati.
an5.174:3.1_0: Pañca, gahapati, bhayāni verāni pahāya ‘sīlavā’ iti vuccati, sugatiñca upapajjati.
an5.174:3.4_0: imāni kho, gahapati, pañca bhayāni verāni pahāya ‘sīlavā’ iti vuccati, sugatiñca upapajjati.
an5.174:4.1_1: pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
an5.174:4.1_4: pāṇātipātā paṭivirato neva diṭṭhadhammikaṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
an5.174:4.2_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
an5.174:8.1_1: surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
an5.174:8.1_4: surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato neva diṭṭhadhammikaṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
an5.174:8.2_0: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hotīti.
an5.175:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:1.5_0: kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṁ pacceti no kammaṁ;
an5.175:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapatikuṭṭho ca.
an5.175:2.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañca.
an5.175:2.5_0: akotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṁ pacceti no maṅgalaṁ;
an5.175:2.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīkañcā”ti.
an5.176:1.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati pañcamattehi upāsakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.176:1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an5.176:2.2_0: Na kho, gahapati, tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā:
an5.176:2.5_0: ‘kinti mayaṁ kālena kālaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja vihareyyāmā’ti.
an5.176:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.176:3.5_0: Na kho, gahapati, tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā—
an5.176:3.8_0: kinti mayaṁ kālena kālaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja vihareyyāmāti.
an5.176:3.10_1: samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharati,
an5.176:3.10_2: pañcassa ṭhānāni tasmiṁ samaye na honti.
an5.176:3.11_0: Yampissa kāmūpasaṁhitaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye na hoti.
an5.176:3.12_0: Yampissa kāmūpasaṁhitaṁ sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye na hoti.
an5.176:3.13_0: Yampissa akusalūpasaṁhitaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye na hoti.
an5.176:3.14_0: Yampissa akusalūpasaṁhitaṁ sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye na hoti.
an5.176:3.15_0: Yampissa kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ, tampissa tasmiṁ samaye na hoti.
an5.176:3.16_1: samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharati,
an5.176:3.16_2: imānissa pañca ṭhānāni tasmiṁ samaye na hontī”ti.

an5.177:1.4_0: imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā”ti.
an5.178:1.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an5.178:1.4_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā pāṇātipātā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’”ti?
an5.178:1.7_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an5.178:1.9_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā pāṇātipātā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’ti.
an5.178:1.10_0: Api ca khvassa tatheva pāpakammaṁ pavedenti:
an5.178:1.11_0: ‘ayaṁ puriso itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā jīvitā voropesīti.
an5.178:1.12_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā pāṇātipātahetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karonti.
an5.178:1.13_0: Api nu tumhehi evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā’”ti?
an5.178:2.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an5.178:2.4_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā adinnādānā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’”ti?
an5.178:2.7_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an5.178:2.9_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā adinnādānā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’ti.
an5.178:2.10_0: Api ca khvassa tatheva pāpakammaṁ pavedenti:
an5.178:2.11_0: ‘ayaṁ puriso gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyīti.
an5.178:2.12_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā adinnādānahetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karonti.
an5.178:2.13_0: Api nu tumhehi evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā’”ti?
an5.178:3.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an5.178:3.4_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’”ti?
an5.178:3.7_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an5.178:3.9_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’ti.
an5.178:3.10_0: Api ca khvassa tatheva pāpakammaṁ pavedenti:
an5.178:3.12_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā kāmesumicchācārahetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karonti.
an5.178:3.13_0: Api nu tumhehi evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā’”ti?
an5.178:4.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an5.178:4.4_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā musāvādā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’”ti?
an5.178:4.7_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an5.178:4.9_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā musāvādā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’ti.
an5.178:4.10_0: Api ca khvassa tatheva pāpakammaṁ pavedenti:
an5.178:4.11_0: ‘ayaṁ puriso gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā musāvādena atthaṁ pabhañjīti.
an5.178:4.12_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā musāvādahetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karonti.
an5.178:4.13_0: Api nu tumhehi evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā’”ti?
an5.178:5.2_0: api nu tumhehi diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā:
an5.178:5.4_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’”ti?
an5.178:5.7_0: Mayāpi kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, neva diṭṭhaṁ na sutaṁ:
an5.178:5.9_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇihetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karontī’ti.
an5.178:5.10_0: Api ca khvassa tatheva pāpakammaṁ pavedenti:
an5.178:5.11_0: ‘ayaṁ puriso surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṁ anuyutto itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā jīvitā voropesi;
an5.178:5.12_0: ayaṁ puriso surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṁ anuyutto gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyi;
an5.178:5.13_0: ayaṁ puriso surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṁ anuyutto paritthīsu parakumārīsu cārittaṁ āpajji;
an5.178:5.14_0: ayaṁ puriso surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṁ anuyutto gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā musāvādena atthaṁ pabhañjīti.
an5.178:5.15_0: Tamenaṁ rājāno gahetvā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānahetu hananti vā bandhanti vā pabbājenti vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karonti.
an5.178:5.16_0: Api nu tumhehi evarūpaṁ diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā’”ti?
an5.179:1.1_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati pañcamattehi upāsakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.179:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
an5.179:1.3_2: jāneyyātha gihiṁ odātavasanaṁ pañcasu sikkhāpadesu saṁvutakammantaṁ catunnaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ
an5.179:3.1_0: Katamesaṁ catunnaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī?
an5.179:3.2_0: Idha, sāriputta, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
an5.179:3.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi,
an5.179:3.4_0: Ayamassa paṭhamo ābhicetasiko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyā apariyodātassa cittassa pariyodapanāya.
an5.179:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, ariyasāvako dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
an5.179:4.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
an5.179:4.3_0: Ayamassa dutiyo ābhicetasiko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyā apariyodātassa cittassa pariyodapanāya.
an5.179:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, ariyasāvako saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
an5.179:5.2_0: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
an5.179:5.2_2: yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
an5.179:5.3_0: Ayamassa tatiyo ābhicetasiko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyā apariyodātassa cittassa pariyodapanāya.
an5.179:6.1_2: ariyasāvako ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi
an5.179:6.2_0: Ayamassa catuttho ābhicetasiko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro adhigato hoti avisuddhassa cittassa visuddhiyā apariyodātassa cittassa pariyodapanāya.
an5.179:6.3_0: Imesaṁ catunnaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.179:7.1_2: jāneyyātha gihiṁ odātavasanaṁ—imesu pañcasu sikkhāpadesu saṁvutakammantaṁ,
an5.179:7.1_3: imesañca catunnaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhiṁ akicchalābhiṁ akasiralābhiṁ,
an5.180:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
an5.180:1.2_0: Addasā kho bhagavā addhānamaggappaṭipanno aññatarasmiṁ padese mahantaṁ sālavanaṁ;
an5.180:1.3_0: disvāna maggā okkamma yena taṁ sālavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:1.3_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ sālavanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi.
an5.180:2.2_0: “ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:2.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.180:2.5_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:3.1_0: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, ānanda, imasmiṁ padese nagaraṁ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṁ ākiṇṇamanussaṁ.
an5.180:3.2_0: Taṁ kho panānanda, nagaraṁ kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
an5.180:3.3_1: bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa gavesī nāma upāsako ahosi sīlesu aparipūrakārī.
an5.180:3.4_1: upāsakena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭidesitāni samādapitāni ahesuṁ sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:3.5_0: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:3.6_0: ‘ahaṁ kho imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā,
an5.180:3.6_2: imāni ca pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:4.1_1: gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:4.3_0: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ etadahosi:
an5.180:4.4_0: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:4.5_0: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī sīlesu paripūrakārī bhavissati.
an5.180:4.7_1: tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.180:4.8_0: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu paripūrakārino dhāretū’ti.
an5.180:4.9_0: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:4.10_0: ‘ahaṁ kho imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā,
an5.180:5.1_1: gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:5.2_0: ‘ajjatagge maṁ āyasmanto brahmacāriṁ dhāretha ārācāriṁ virataṁ methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:5.3_0: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ etadahosi:
an5.180:5.4_0: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:5.5_0: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī brahmacārī bhavissati ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:5.7_1: tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.180:5.8_0: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino dhāretu ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:5.9_0: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:5.10_0: ‘ahaṁ kho imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:5.13_0: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:5.14_0: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.1_1: gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:6.2_0: ‘ajjatagge maṁ āyasmanto ekabhattikaṁ dhāretha rattūparataṁ virataṁ vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:6.3_0: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ etadahosi:
an5.180:6.5_0: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī ekabhattiko bhavissati rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:6.7_1: tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.180:6.8_0: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattike dhāretu rattūparate virate vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:6.9_0: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:6.10_0: ‘ahaṁ kho imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:6.13_0: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.14_0: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.16_0: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:7.1_1: gavesī upāsako yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:7.1_2: upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
an5.180:7.2_0: ‘labheyyāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ labheyyaṁ upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:7.3_1: gavesī upāsako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṁ,
an5.180:7.4_1: gavesī bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
an5.180:7.4_2: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an5.180:7.5_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsi.
an5.180:7.6_0: Aññataro ca panānanda, gavesī bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosi.
an5.180:8.1_0: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṁ pañcannaṁ upāsakasatānaṁ etadahosi:
an5.180:8.2_0: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṁ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:8.3_0: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissati.
an5.180:8.5_1: tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
an5.180:8.5_2: upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
an5.180:8.6_0: ‘labheyyāma mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyāma upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:8.7_1: tāni pañca upāsakasatāni kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṁ,
an5.180:9.1_0: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi:
an5.180:9.2_0: ‘ahaṁ kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhī homi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.180:9.3_0: Aho vatimānipi pañca bhikkhusatāni imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino’ti.
an5.180:9.4_1: tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharantā nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
an5.180:9.5_0: brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihariṁsu.
an5.180:9.6_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññiṁsu.
an5.180:10.1_1: tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni gavesīpamukhāni uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītaṁ vāyamamānā anuttaraṁ vimuttiṁ sacchākaṁsu.
an5.181:1.3_4: appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva nissāya pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya āraññiko hoti.
an5.181:1.5_2: pañcannaṁ āraññikānaṁ yvāyaṁ āraññiko appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva nissāya
an5.181:1.5_3: pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya āraññiko hoti,
an5.181:1.5_4: ayaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ āraññikānaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
an5.181:2.2_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ āraññikānaṁ yvāyaṁ āraññiko appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva
an5.181:2.2_3: nissāya pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya āraññiko hoti,
an5.181:2.2_4: ayaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ āraññikānaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
an5.182:1.3_0: Mandattā momūhattā paṁsukūliko hoti …pe… idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya paṁsukūliko hoti.
an5.183:1.3_0: Mandattā momūhattā rukkhamūliko hoti …pe… idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya rukkhamūliko hoti.
an5.184:1.3_0: Mandattā momūhattā sosāniko hoti …pe… idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya sosāniko hoti.
an5.190:1.3_4: appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva nissāya pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya pattapiṇḍiko hoti.
an5.190:1.5_2: pañcannaṁ pattapiṇḍikānaṁ yvāyaṁ pattapiṇḍiko appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva
an5.190:1.5_3: nissāya pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya pattapiṇḍiko hoti,
an5.190:1.5_4: ayaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ pattapiṇḍikānaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
an5.190:2.2_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ pattapiṇḍikānaṁ yvāyaṁ pattapiṇḍiko appicchataṁyeva nissāya santuṭṭhiṁyeva nissāya sallekhaṁyeva
an5.190:2.2_3: nissāya pavivekaṁyeva nissāya idamatthitaṁyeva nissāya pattapiṇḍiko hoti,
an5.190:2.2_4: ayaṁ imesaṁ pañcannaṁ pattapiṇḍikānaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
an5.191:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, porāṇā brāhmaṇadhammā etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:1.3_0: Pubbe sudaṁ, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇiṁyeva gacchanti, no abrāhmaṇiṁ.
an5.191:1.4_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇimpi gacchanti, abrāhmaṇimpi gacchanti.
an5.191:1.5_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhā sunakhiṁyeva gacchanti, no asunakhiṁ.
an5.191:1.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo porāṇo brāhmaṇadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:2.1_0: Pubbe sudaṁ, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇiṁ utuniṁyeva gacchanti, no anutuniṁ.
an5.191:2.2_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇiṁ utunimpi gacchanti, anutunimpi gacchanti.
an5.191:2.3_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhā sunakhiṁ utuniṁyeva gacchanti, no anutuniṁ.
an5.191:2.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo porāṇo brāhmaṇadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:3.1_2: brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇiṁ neva kiṇanti no vikkiṇanti,
an5.191:3.3_2: sunakhā sunakhiṁ neva kiṇanti no vikkiṇanti,
an5.191:3.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo porāṇo brāhmaṇadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:4.1_2: brāhmaṇā na sannidhiṁ karonti dhanassapi dhaññassapi rajatassapi jātarūpassapi.
an5.191:4.2_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā sannidhiṁ karonti dhanassapi dhaññassapi rajatassapi jātarūpassapi.
an5.191:4.3_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhā na sannidhiṁ karonti dhanassapi dhaññassapi rajatassapi jātarūpassapi.
an5.191:4.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho porāṇo brāhmaṇadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:5.1_0: Pubbe sudaṁ, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā sāyaṁ sāyamāsāya pāto pātarāsāya bhikkhaṁ pariyesanti.
an5.191:5.2_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇā yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā avasesaṁ ādāya pakkamanti.
an5.191:5.3_0: Etarahi, bhikkhave, sunakhā sāyaṁ sāyamāsāya pāto pātarāsāya bhikkhaṁ pariyesanti.
an5.191:5.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo porāṇo brāhmaṇadhammo etarahi sunakhesu sandissati, no brāhmaṇesu.
an5.191:5.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca porāṇā brāhmaṇadhammā etarahi sunakhesu sandissanti, no brāhmaṇesū”ti.
an5.192:1.1_0: Atha kho doṇo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an5.192:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.192:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho doṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.192:2.2_0: ‘na samaṇo gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī’ti.
an5.192:2.4_0: Na hi bhavaṁ gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe vuḍḍhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimanteti.
an5.192:2.7_0: “Yañhi taṁ, bho gotama, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
an5.192:2.9_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena,
an5.192:2.9_4: tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ,
an5.192:2.10_0: Ahañhi, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo ubhato sujāto—
an5.192:2.11_2: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena,
an5.192:2.11_4: tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ,
an5.192:3.1_1: brāhmaṇānaṁ pubbakā isayo mantānaṁ kattāro mantānaṁ pavattāro,
an5.192:3.1_2: yesamidaṁ etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇaṁ mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samihitaṁ tadanugāyanti tadanubhāsanti bhāsitamanubhāsanti
an5.192:3.3_0: brahmasamaṁ, devasamaṁ, mariyādaṁ, sambhinnamariyādaṁ, brāhmaṇacaṇḍālaṁyeva pañcamaṁ.
an5.192:4.1_0: “Na kho mayaṁ, bho gotama, pañca brāhmaṇe jānāma, atha kho mayaṁ brāhmaṇātveva jānāma.
an5.192:4.2_0: Sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā ahaṁ ime pañca brāhmaṇe jāneyyan”ti.
an5.192:4.3_0: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇohi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an5.192:4.4_0: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho doṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
an5.192:5.2_0: Idha, doṇa, brāhmaṇo ubhato sujāto hoti—
an5.192:5.3_0: mātito ca pitito ca, saṁsuddhagahaṇiko, yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
an5.192:5.4_0: So aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ carati mante adhīyamāno.
an5.192:5.5_0: Aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ caritvā mante adhīyitvā ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ pariyesati dhammeneva,
an5.192:6.2_0: Neva kasiyā na vaṇijjāya na gorakkhena na issatthena na rājaporisena na sippaññatarena,
an5.192:6.3_0: So ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ niyyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
an5.192:6.4_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an5.192:6.4_1: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ,
an5.192:6.4_2: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an5.192:6.7_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an5.192:6.7_1: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ,
an5.192:6.7_2: iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an5.192:6.8_0: So ime cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ brahmalokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.192:6.9_0: Evaṁ kho, doṇa, brāhmaṇo brahmasamo hoti.
an5.192:7.2_0: Idha, doṇa, brāhmaṇo ubhato sujāto hoti—
an5.192:7.3_0: mātito ca pitito ca, saṁsuddhagahaṇiko, yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
an5.192:7.4_0: So aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ carati mante adhīyamāno.
an5.192:7.5_0: Aṭṭhacattālīsavassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ caritvā mante adhīyitvā ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ pariyesati dhammeneva,
an5.192:7.7_0: Neva kasiyā na vaṇijjāya na gorakkhena na issatthena na rājaporisena na sippaññatarena,
an5.192:7.8_0: So ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ niyyādetvā dāraṁ pariyesati dhammeneva, no adhammena.
an5.192:8.2_0: Neva kayena na vikkayena, brāhmaṇiṁyeva udakūpassaṭṭhaṁ.
an5.192:8.3_1: na khattiyiṁ na vessiṁ na suddiṁ na caṇḍāliṁ na nesādiṁ na veniṁ na rathakāriṁ na pukkusiṁ gacchati,
an5.192:8.4_0: Kasmā ca, doṇa, brāhmaṇo na gabbhiniṁ gacchati?
an5.192:8.5_0: Sace, doṇa, brāhmaṇo gabbhiniṁ gacchati, atimīḷhajo nāma so hoti māṇavako vā māṇavikā vā.
an5.192:8.6_0: Tasmā, doṇa, brāhmaṇo na gabbhiniṁ gacchati.
an5.192:8.7_0: Kasmā ca, doṇa, brāhmaṇo na pāyamānaṁ gacchati?
an5.192:8.8_0: Sace, doṇa, brāhmaṇo pāyamānaṁ gacchati, asucipaṭipīḷito nāma so hoti māṇavako vā māṇavikā vā.
an5.192:8.9_0: Tasmā, doṇa, brāhmaṇo na pāyamānaṁ gacchati.
an5.192:8.10_0: Tassa sā hoti brāhmaṇī neva kāmatthā na davatthā na ratatthā, pajatthāva brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī hoti.
an5.192:8.11_0: So methunaṁ uppādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
an5.192:8.12_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno vivicceva kāmehi …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an5.192:8.13_0: So ime cattāro jhāne bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.192:8.14_0: Evaṁ kho, doṇa, brāhmaṇo devasamo hoti.

an5.192:10.11_0: So methunaṁ uppādetvā tameva puttassādaṁ nikāmayamāno kuṭumbaṁ ajjhāvasati,
an5.192:10.12_0: Yāva porāṇānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ mariyādo tattha tiṭṭhati, taṁ na vītikkamati.

an5.192:10.14_0: Evaṁ kho, doṇa, brāhmaṇo mariyādo hoti.

an5.192:12.8_0: Evaṁ kho, doṇa, brāhmaṇo sambhinnamariyādo hoti.

an5.192:13.6_0: kasiyāpi vaṇijjāyapi gorakkhenapi issatthenapi rājaporisenapi sippaññatarenapi,
an5.192:14.1_0: So ācariyassa ācariyadhanaṁ niyyādetvā dāraṁ pariyesati dhammenapi adhammenapi kayenapi vikkayenapi brāhmaṇimpi udakūpassaṭṭhaṁ.
an5.192:14.2_0: So brāhmaṇimpi gacchati khattiyimpi gacchati vessimpi gacchati suddimpi gacchati caṇḍālimpi gacchati
an5.192:14.2_1: nesādimpi gacchati venimpi gacchati rathakārimpi gacchati pukkusimpi gacchati gabbhinimpi gacchati pāyamānampi
an5.192:14.3_0: Tassa sā hoti brāhmaṇī kāmatthāpi davatthāpi ratatthāpi pajatthāpi brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī hoti.
an5.192:14.6_0: ‘kasmā bhavaṁ brāhmaṇo paṭijānamāno sabbakammehi jīvikaṁ kappetī’ti?
an5.192:14.8_0: ‘seyyathāpi, bho, aggi sucimpi ḍahati asucimpi ḍahati, na ca tena aggi upalippati;
an5.192:14.9_0: evamevaṁ kho, bho, sabbakammehi cepi brāhmaṇo jīvikaṁ kappeti, na ca tena brāhmaṇo upalippati.
an5.192:14.10_0: Sabbakammehi jīvikaṁ kappetī’ti kho, doṇa, tasmā brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇacaṇḍāloti vuccati.
an5.192:14.11_0: Evaṁ kho, doṇa, brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇacaṇḍālo hoti.
an5.192:15.1_1: brāhmaṇānaṁ pubbakā isayo mantānaṁ kattāro mantānaṁ pavattāro yesamidaṁ etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇaṁ mantapadaṁ
an5.192:15.1_2: gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samīhitaṁ tadanugāyanti tadanubhāsanti bhāsitamanubhāsanti sajjhāyitamanusajjhāyanti vācitamanuvācenti,
an5.192:15.3_0: brahmasamaṁ, devasamaṁ, mariyādaṁ, sambhinnamariyādaṁ, brāhmaṇacaṇḍālaṁyeva pañcamaṁ.
an5.192:16.1_0: Evaṁ sante mayaṁ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇacaṇḍālampi na pūrema.
an5.192:16.2_2: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an5.193:1.1_0: Atha kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an5.193:1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an5.193:1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.193:1.3_3: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ sajjhāyakatāpi mantā nappaṭibhanti,
an5.193:1.4_3: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti,
an5.193:2.1_2: uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
an5.193:2.1_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti na passati,
an5.193:2.1_4: paratthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti na passati,
an5.193:2.1_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti na passati,
an5.193:2.2_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto saṁsaṭṭho lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā.
an5.193:2.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ nappajāneyya na passeyya.
an5.193:2.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena,

an5.193:3.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena,
