an5.193:10.2_0: seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto na vāterito na calito na bhanto na ūmijāto.
an5.193:10.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5.193:10.4_0: Evamevaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, yasmiṁ samaye na uddhaccakukkuccapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati …pe….
an5.193:11.1_1: yasmiṁ samaye na vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchāparetena,
an5.193:11.1_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an5.193:11.1_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5.193:11.1_4: paratthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5.193:11.1_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5.193:11.2_0: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, udapatto accho vippasanno anāvilo āloke nikkhitto.
an5.193:11.3_0: Tattha cakkhumā puriso sakaṁ mukhanimittaṁ paccavekkhamāno yathābhūtaṁ pajāneyya passeyya.
an5.193:11.4_1: yasmiṁ samaye na vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati na vicikicchāparetena,
an5.193:11.4_2: uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
an5.193:11.4_3: attatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5.193:11.4_5: ubhayatthampi tasmiṁ samaye yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti passati,
an5.193:12.1_2: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ sajjhāyakatāpi mantā nappaṭibhanti,
an5.193:12.2_2: yena kadāci dīgharattaṁ asajjhāyakatāpi mantā paṭibhanti,
an5.193:13.1_2: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an5.194:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.194:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo licchavīnaṁ kammantaṁ kāreti.
an5.194:1.3_0: Addasā kho kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo piṅgiyāniṁ brāhmaṇaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
an5.194:2.1_0: “Handa kuto nu bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī āgacchati divā divassā”ti?
an5.194:2.3_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññati bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ? Paṇḍito maññe”ti?
an5.194:2.4_0: “Ko cāhaṁ, bho, ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jānissāmi.
an5.194:2.5_0: Sopi nūnassa tādisova yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jāneyyā”ti.
an5.194:2.6_0: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsāya pasaṁsatī”ti.
an5.194:2.7_0: “Ko cāhaṁ, bho, ko ca samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsissāmi.
an5.194:2.8_0: Pasatthappasatthova so bhavaṁ gotamo seṭṭho devamanussānan”ti.
an5.194:2.9_0: “Kiṁ pana bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī atthavasaṁ sampassamāno samaṇe gotame evaṁ abhippasanno”ti?
an5.194:3.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso aggarasaparititto na aññesaṁ hīnānaṁ rasānaṁ piheti;
an5.194:3.2_0: evamevaṁ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5.194:3.3_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:3.4_0: tato tato na aññesaṁ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇappavādānaṁ piheti.
an5.194:4.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso jighacchādubbalyapareto madhupiṇḍikaṁ adhigaccheyya.
an5.194:4.2_0: So yato yato sāyetha, labhateva sādurasaṁ asecanakaṁ;
an5.194:4.3_0: evamevaṁ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5.194:4.4_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:4.5_0: tato tato labhateva attamanataṁ, labhati cetaso pasādaṁ.
an5.194:5.4_0: yadi mūlato, yadi majjhato, yadi aggato—
an5.194:5.6_0: evamevaṁ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5.194:5.7_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:5.8_0: tato tato adhigacchati pāmojjaṁ adhigacchati somanassaṁ.
an5.194:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bho, puriso ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
an5.194:6.2_0: Tassa kusalo bhisakko ṭhānaso ābādhaṁ nīhareyya;
an5.194:6.3_0: evamevaṁ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5.194:6.4_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:7.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bho, pokkharaṇī acchodakā sātodakā sītodakā setakā supatitthā ramaṇīyā.
an5.194:7.2_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
an5.194:7.3_0: So taṁ pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā nhātvā ca pivitvā ca sabbadarathakilamathapariḷāhaṁ paṭippassambheyya.
an5.194:7.4_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bho, yato yato tassa bhoto gotamassa dhammaṁ suṇāti—
an5.194:7.5_0: yadi suttaso, yadi geyyaso, yadi veyyākaraṇaso, yadi abbhutadhammaso—
an5.194:8.1_1: kāraṇapālī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā dakkhiṇaṁ jāṇumaṇḍalaṁ pathaviyaṁ nihantvā
an5.194:8.1_2: yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
an5.194:12.1_0: Abhikkantaṁ, bho piṅgiyāni, abhikkantaṁ, bho piṅgiyāni.
an5.194:12.2_2: nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya,
an5.194:12.2_3: mūḷhassa vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya:
an5.194:12.2_5: evamevaṁ bhotā piṅgiyāninā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
an5.194:12.3_0: Esāhaṁ, bho piṅgiyāni, taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
an5.194:12.4_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī dhāretu, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an5.195:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
an5.195:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni licchavisatāni bhagavantaṁ payirupāsanti.
an5.195:1.3_0: Appekacce licchavī nīlā honti nīlavaṇṇā nīlavatthā nīlālaṅkārā,
an5.195:1.3_1: appekacce licchavī pītā honti pītavaṇṇā pītavatthā pītālaṅkārā,
an5.195:1.3_2: appekacce licchavī lohitakā honti lohitakavaṇṇā lohitakavatthā lohitakālaṅkārā,
an5.195:1.3_3: appekacce licchavī odātā honti odātavaṇṇā odātavatthā odātālaṅkārā.
an5.195:1.4_0: Tyassudaṁ bhagavā atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā ca.
an5.195:2.1_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.195:2.4_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo bhagavato sammukhā sāruppāya gāthāya abhitthavi:
an5.195:4.1_0: Atha kho te licchavī pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi piṅgiyāniṁ brāhmaṇaṁ acchādesuṁ.
an5.195:4.2_0: Atha kho piṅgiyānī brāhmaṇo tehi pañcahi uttarāsaṅgasatehi bhagavantaṁ acchādesi.
an5.195:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā te licchavī etadavoca:
an5.195:5.4_0: Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5.195:5.5_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5.195:5.6_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5.195:5.7_0: Tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa viññātā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmiṁ.
an5.195:5.9_0: Imesaṁ kho, licchavī, pañcannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an5.196:1.1_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesuṁ.
an5.196:1.3_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ mahāpathavī mahāsayanaṁ ahosi,
an5.196:1.3_4: puratthime samudde vāmo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5.196:1.3_5: pacchime samudde dakkhiṇo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5.196:1.3_6: dakkhiṇe samudde ubho pādā ohitā ahesuṁ.
an5.196:1.4_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ paṭhamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:2.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyā
an5.196:2.1_3: nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi.
an5.196:2.2_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ dutiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:3.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setā
an5.196:3.1_3: kimī kaṇhasīsā pādehi ussakkitvā (…) yāva jāṇumaṇḍalā paṭicchādesuṁ.
an5.196:3.2_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:4.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattāro
an5.196:4.1_3: sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṁsu.
an5.196:4.2_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:5.1_2: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena.
an5.196:5.2_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:6.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ayaṁ mahāpathavī mahāsayanaṁ ahosi,
an5.196:6.1_4: puratthime samudde vāmo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5.196:6.1_5: pacchime samudde dakkhiṇo hattho ohito ahosi,
an5.196:6.1_6: dakkhiṇe samudde ubho pādā ohitā ahesuṁ;
an5.196:6.2_0: tathāgatena, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena anuttarā sammāsambodhi abhisambuddhā.
an5.196:6.3_0: Tassā abhisambodhāya ayaṁ paṭhamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:7.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato tiriyā
an5.196:7.1_3: nāma tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi;
an5.196:7.2_2: arahatā sammāsambuddhena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo abhisambujjhitvā yāva devamanussehi suppakāsito.
an5.196:7.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ dutiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:8.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato setā
an5.196:8.1_3: kimī kaṇhasīsā pādehi ussakkitvā yāva jāṇumaṇḍalā paṭicchādesuṁ;
an5.196:8.2_0: bahū, bhikkhave, gihī odātavasanā tathāgataṁ pāṇupetā saraṇaṁ gatā.
an5.196:8.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:9.1_2: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattāro
an5.196:9.1_3: sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṁsu;
an5.196:9.2_2: vaṇṇā khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā suddā te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā anuttaraṁ vimuttiṁ sacchikaronti.
an5.196:9.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:10.1_2: tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena;
an5.196:10.2_3: taṁ tathāgato agathito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
an5.196:10.3_0: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṁ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5.196:11.1_2: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ime pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesun”ti.
an5.197:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, vassassa antarāyā, yaṁ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṁ cakkhu na kamati.
an5.197:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, upari ākāse vāyodhātu pakuppati.
an5.197:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, rāhu asurindo pāṇinā udakaṁ sampaṭicchitvā mahāsamudde chaḍḍeti.
an5.197:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, vassavalāhakā devā pamattā honti.
an5.197:5.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, manussā adhammikā honti.
an5.198:1.4_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti,
an5.199:1.1_3: tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti.
an5.199:1.3_2: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni pasādenti,
an5.199:1.3_5: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5.199:2.1_2: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā paccuṭṭhenti abhivādenti āsanaṁ denti,
an5.199:2.1_5: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5.199:3.1_2: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā maccheramalaṁ paṭivinenti,
an5.199:3.1_5: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5.199:4.1_2: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā yathāsatti yathābalaṁ saṁvibhajanti,
an5.199:4.1_5: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5.199:5.1_2: samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṁ upasaṅkamante manussā paripucchanti paripañhanti dhammaṁ suṇanti,
an5.199:5.1_5: taṁ kulaṁ tasmiṁ samaye paṭipadaṁ paṭipannaṁ hoti.
an5.199:5.2_3: tattha manussā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavantī”ti.
an5.200:1.3_2: bhikkhuno kāmaṁ manasikaroto kāmesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5.200:1.4_0: Nekkhammaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5.200:1.5_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ kāmehi;
an5.200:1.6_0: ye ca kāmapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5.200:2.1_2: bhikkhuno byāpādaṁ manasikaroto byāpāde cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5.200:2.2_0: Abyāpādaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto abyāpāde cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5.200:2.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ byāpādena;
an5.200:2.4_0: ye ca byāpādapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5.200:3.1_2: bhikkhuno vihesaṁ manasikaroto vihesāya cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5.200:3.2_0: Avihesaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto avihesāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5.200:3.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ vihesāya;
an5.200:3.4_0: ye ca vihesāpaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5.200:4.1_2: bhikkhuno rūpaṁ manasikaroto rūpe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5.200:4.2_0: Arūpaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto arūpe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5.200:4.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ rūpehi;
an5.200:4.4_0: ye ca rūpapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5.200:5.1_2: bhikkhuno sakkāyaṁ manasikaroto sakkāye cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5.200:5.2_0: Sakkāyanirodhaṁ kho panassa manasikaroto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5.200:5.3_0: Tassa taṁ cittaṁ sugataṁ subhāvitaṁ suvuṭṭhitaṁ suvimuttaṁ suvisaṁyuttaṁ sakkāyena;
an5.200:5.4_0: ye ca sakkāyapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyati.
an5.200:6.3_0: Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
an5.201:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kimilāyaṁ viharati veḷuvane.
an5.201:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā kimilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.201:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kimilo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an5.201:1.3_0: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5.201:1.4_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari agāravā viharanti appatissā,
an5.201:1.5_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5.201:2.1_0: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5.201:2.2_1: tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari sagāravā viharanti sappatissā,
an5.201:2.3_0: Ayaṁ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṁ paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5.202:1.3_0: Assutaṁ suṇāti, sutaṁ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṁ vitarati, diṭṭhiṁ ujuṁ karoti, cittamassa pasīdati.
an5.202:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā dhammassavane”ti.
an5.203:1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5.203:2.3_2: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an5.203:2.4_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an5.203:3.3_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā”ti.
an5.205:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
an5.205:1.4_2: bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati,
an5.205:1.4_3: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5.205:1.5_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ paṭhamo cetokhilo.
an5.205:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati …pe…
an5.205:2.4_0: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto.
an5.205:2.5_2: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto,
an5.205:2.5_3: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5.205:2.6_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ pañcamo cetokhilo.
an5.206:1.3_2: bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an5.206:1.4_2: bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho,
an5.206:1.4_3: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5.206:1.5_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ paṭhamo cetasovinibandho.
an5.206:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye avītarāgo hoti …pe…
an5.206:2.3_0: yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati …pe…
an5.206:2.4_1: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
an5.206:2.5_2: bhikkhu aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ carati:
an5.206:2.5_3: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti,
an5.206:2.5_4: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5.206:2.6_0: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṁ pañcamo cetasovinibandho.
an5.207:1.3_0: Khuddaṁ paṭihanati, pipāsaṁ paṭivineti, vātaṁ anulometi, vatthiṁ sodheti, āmāvasesaṁ pāceti.
an5.207:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā yāguyā”ti.
an5.208:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
an5.208:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane”ti.
an5.209:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṁ bhaṇantassa.
an5.209:1.3_0: Attanāpi tasmiṁ sare sārajjati, parepi tasmiṁ sare sārajjanti, gahapatikāpi ujjhāyanti:
an5.209:1.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṁ bhaṇantassā”ti.
an5.210:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato.
an5.210:1.3_0: Dukkhaṁ supati, dukkhaṁ paṭibujjhati, pāpakaṁ supinaṁ passati, devatā na rakkhanti, asuci muccati.
an5.210:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato.
an5.210:2.1_0: Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṁsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato.
an5.210:2.3_0: Sukhaṁ supati, sukhaṁ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṁ supinaṁ passati, devatā rakkhanti, asuci na muccati.
an5.210:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṁ okkamayato”ti.
an5.211:1.3_4: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.212:1.1_2: bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako,
an5.212:1.3_4: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.212:1.4_2: bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako,
an5.213:1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahatiṁ bhogajāniṁ nigacchati.
an5.213:1.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:2.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:3.1_2: dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ,
an5.213:3.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti.
an5.213:4.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:5.1_2: dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.213:5.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:5.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:6.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahantaṁ bhogakkhandhaṁ adhigacchati.
an5.213:6.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:7.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:8.1_2: sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ,

an5.213:9.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṁ karoti.

an5.213:10.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
an5.214:1.3_4: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.

an5.219:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā aggismin”ti.
an5.220:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā madhurāyan”ti.
an5.221:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5.221:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5.221:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā samavatthacāre”ti.
an5.222:1.1_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5.222:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṁ anavatthacārikaṁ anuyuttassa viharato.

an5.223:1.3_4: tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto sāpekkho pakkamati.
an5.223:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5.223:2.3_2: na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo na byatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu,
an5.223:2.3_4: tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati.
an5.223:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā samavatthavāse”ti.

an5.226:1.7_1: ‘anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṁ carissati aññataraṁ vā saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjissati sikkhaṁ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati’.
an5.226:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṁ kulesu saṁsaṭṭhassa viharato”ti.
an5.227:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bhogesu.
an5.227:2.3_0: Bhoge nissāya attānaṁ sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5.227:2.3_1: mātāpitaro sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5.227:2.3_2: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5.227:2.3_3: mittāmacce sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṁ pariharati,
an5.227:2.3_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṁ sukhavipākaṁ saggasaṁvattanikaṁ.
an5.227:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā bhogesū”ti.
an5.228:1.3_0: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:1.4_0: yā tā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā, tā na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:1.5_0: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:1.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā ussūrabhatte kule.
an5.228:2.3_0: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:2.4_0: yā tā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā, tā kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:2.5_0: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5.228:2.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā samayabhatte kule”ti.
an5.229:1.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kaṇhasappe.
an5.229:2.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā mātugāme.
an5.229:2.4_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā mātugāme”ti.

an5.231:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
an5.231:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
an5.231:2.1_0: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu bhāvanīyo hoti.

an5.232:1.1_2: dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5.232:1.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
an5.232:1.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
an5.232:1.4_2: tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5.232:1.5_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5.232:1.6_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5.232:1.7_0: āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5.232:1.8_2: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṁ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5.233:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsaṁ sobheti.
an5.233:1.5_0: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5.233:1.6_0: paṭibalo hoti upasaṅkamante dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṁ samādapetuṁ samuttejetuṁ sampahaṁsetuṁ;
an5.233:1.7_0: catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ ābhicetasikānaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṁ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.233:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsaṁ sobhetī”ti.
an5.234:1.1_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsassa bahūpakāro hoti.
an5.234:1.6_0: mahā kho pana bhikkhusaṅgho abhikkanto nānāverajjakā bhikkhū gihīnaṁ upasaṅkamitvā āroceti:

an5.234:1.9_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsassa bahūpakāro hotī”ti.

an5.249:1.3_0: Asuci, duggandhā, sappaṭibhayā, vāḷānaṁ amanussānaṁ āvāso, bahuno janassa ārodanā—
an5.249:1.4_0: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikāya.
an5.249:2.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale.
an5.249:2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asucinā kāyakammena samannāgato hoti;
an5.249:3.1_2: asucinā manokammena samannāgatassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.249:4.1_2: asucinā manokammena samannāgataṁ pesalā sabrahmacārī ārakā parivajjanti.
an5.249:5.1_2: asucinā manokammena samannāgato sabhāgehi puggalehi saddhiṁ saṁvasati.
an5.249:5.3_0: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā vāḷānaṁ amanussānaṁ āvāso;
an5.249:6.1_2: asucinā manokammena samannāgataṁ pesalā sabrahmacārī disvā khīyadhammaṁ āpajjanti:
an5.249:6.2_0: ‘aho vata no dukkhaṁ ye mayaṁ evarūpehi puggalehi saddhiṁ saṁvasāmā’ti.
an5.249:6.4_0: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā bahuno janassa ārodanā;
an5.249:6.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale”ti.
an5.250:1.3_3: so tathārūpaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ukkhipati.
an5.250:1.5_0: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ukkhitto’ti.
an5.250:1.7_0: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:1.8_0: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:2.1_3: so tathārūpaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ante nisīdāpeti.
an5.250:2.3_0: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ante nisīdāpito’ti.
an5.250:2.5_0: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:2.6_0: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:3.3_0: ‘yo kho myāyaṁ puggalo piyo manāpo so kālaṅkato’ti.
an5.250:3.5_0: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṁ na suṇāti.
an5.250:3.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā puggalappasāde”ti.

an5.251:1.8_0: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabban”ti.
